name: fame-intense
detail: More irreverent  more mischievous  and more galvanized: Fame Intense brings a yet more addictive incarnation of the original scent. Crafted with the most exceptional ingredients by globally renowned perfumers Dora Baghriche  Marie Salamagne  Alberto Morillas and Fabrice Pellegrin  Fame Intense is an ode to the most dazzling facets of femininity.

name: zazen
detail: Still and silent as it is defined by mindfulness  Zazen is a fragrance of tranquillity  a welcome pilgrimage toward calm and contentment. Effusing softly like the gentle sound of bamboo flutes  Zazen's accords meld seamlessly  quieting the mind and positing a moment of perfect clarity.

name: une-tonne-de-roses-8
detail: I love you a little  a lot  passionately: here the rose plays freely. Une Tonne de Roses / 8 is a crazy profusion of petals that celebrates the rose in a joyful olfactory feast.

name: celestial-patchouli
detail: This bewitching bouquet gives patchouli oil an elegant makeover  worlds away from the overpowering versions most of us are used to. A natural aphrodisiac and mood-booster  patchouli’s smoky character is given extra sparkle with Turkish rose  set against a nuzzle-worthy backdrop of leather and cedar.

name: osmanthus-elixir
detail: Osmanthus  but not entirely as you know it. It's a new discovery  catapulting you into a sunny field of flowers embellished with intense citrus notes  crisp and mesmerising as illustrious as the original but more achingly profound.

name: vanille-sauvage-de-madagascar-1
detail: Inspired by the colourful  wild and luminous island of Madagascar  this scent evokes the fleeting freshness of an exotic forest after the storm.

name: strawberry-letter
detail: Like a love note sealed with a kiss  Strawberry Letter is hard to forget. Alluring  addictive and undeniably sexy.

name: dare
detail: Sexy and addictive  Dare is an intoxicating scent with a seductive dry down. You've never experienced cherry like this.

name: pivoine-1
detail: Fragonard's Pivoine invites the onlooker to revel in a relaxing stroll amongst the peony bushes laden with their red  pink  and white flowers  enchanting the eyes and the senses. And although the flower itself is generous and explosive   the sent of the peony is subtle and complex  soft delicate  and slightly fruity  it hides a tender and open heart.

name: infusion-diris-1
detail: "In Les Infusions de Prada  there is a rare luxury you don't often find nowadays. At first they appear to be very simple  as if you were tattooing water with an ingredient  but in reality  it is a very complex formula. In a similar way  that water must be at a particular temperature to create the perfect tea  the base composition allows the beauty of a flower  wood or fruit to be revealed in a bright and sensitive way " Daniela Andrier  Perfumer.

name: blue-mandarine
detail: Positano. Lost between two mountains that bathe the sea  this little Amalfi village shines. Rocked by the waves and in the shade of our sail  we wander through this bustling village where men and women shake hands  embrace and kiss. Deep layers of colour intermingle on the facades forming a patchwork dedicated to the sun  to Helios  to the sun. Floating in the air  just above the water  is the perfumed trail of the Dolce Vita.

name: h24-herbes-vives-eau-de-parfum
detail: Herbes Vives emerges when rain strikes  breaking a man’s stride. Transforming the perception of space  rain illuminates greenery in a multitude of shades and scents  reveals unique emotions  reactivates energy  and offers men a different perspective.

name: le-mole
detail: Le Mole is a unique fragrance suitable for men and women who enjoy the joys of living a full and exciting life.

name: bronze-goddess-flora-verde-2024
detail: This scent encapsulates the spirit of the Brazilian carnival  in a vibrant and playful composition.

name: tubereuse-ylang-de-pashmina
detail: Tubéreuse & Ylang by Pashmina is a divinely mysterious singular fragrance  bringing with it the warmest of the Orient.

name: khamrah
detail: This is a pulsating  passionate scent with an intense trail.

name: silver-scent
detail: This fragrance is a return to the brand's foundations and an immersion in the world of the seventh art. It revives the myth of Humphrey Bogart  the brand's only muse  and helps to celebrate its 30th anniversary with elegance.

name: western-leather-black-1
detail: Western Leather is the final touch to complete an outfit and the essential accessory to assert one's personality. Western Leather is for sensual men with western elegance  who exude physical strength and an exceptional mindset.

name: myrrh-tonka-cologne-intense
detail: The golden sand dunes of the Namib: home of distinctive myrrh trees. The alluring scent of its resin travelling on the hot air  mingling with the warm almond and lush vanilla notes of the tonka bean. Noble and intoxicating.

name: chloe-nomade-nuit-degypte
detail: Nomade Nuit d’Égypte is an homage to the creator’s homeland. Born in 1921 in Alexandria  Gaby Aghion later left Egypt for France in the mid-1940s. Ever since she founded Chloé in 1952  the memories of her birthplace have continually inspired the Maison’s style.

name: myrrh-kumquat
detail: The slightly spicy-sweet scent of myrrh has a special balsamic subtlety and supports the mental relaxation. The tart-sweet aroma of the Kumquat revives the spirit at the same time and thus provides an exciting combination.  This balsamic composition harmonizes the spirit and gives peace and serenity.

name: replica-by-the-fireplace-1
detail: Marked with its provenance and period  this fragrance recreates moments and olfactive memories  triggering images that echo the collective unconscious as well as our own personal history. Snow falls; Inside  frosted window panes reflect warm flames crackling in the fireplace. Notes of grilled chestnuts mingle with the comforting scent of firewood. ‘By the Fireplace' captures the memory of a quintessential winter morning.

name: wilde
detail: Creative expressionism of individuality  freedom and self. Inspired by the gentleman himself  Oscar Wilde. Understated but with an unmistakable presence.

name: sandal-ruby
detail: A fragrant ode to the magnetic queen of gemstones  Sandal Ruby is a rich and elegant embodiment of the talismanic ruby. The bejewelled red fragrance captures the intense aura of true passion.

name: cinnamon-toast-1
detail: Cinnamon  sugar  and all buttery. And Amazing benefits? Who knew?

name: miss-dior-parfum
detail: Between strength and grace  between recklessness and elegance. Miss Dior Parfum is the breath of femininity and youth according to Dior. Francis Kurkdjian  Dior Perfume Creative Director  reappropriates the initial olfactory inspiration of Miss Dior to imbue it with the spirit of today's youth.

name: daisy-anniversary-limited-edition-2017
detail: Daisy Marc Jacobs Anniversary Edition introduces a luxurious limited edition bottle  bold and striking  it elevates this fragrance to a new level of luxury. Optimistic  beautiful and pure.

name: violette-macaron
detail: A soft and delicate combination  inspired by the South of France  which reveals all your femininity.

name: sa-majeste-la-rose-1
detail: The king is dead  long live the queen! Author Marcel Proust based his Madame de Guermantes on three society women of his day. Like Proust  I went in search of the lost land of childhood. On a quest for my rose  I charmed three royals  one Turkish  one Bulgarian and one Moroccan  for the perfect ending to my regal journey.

name: une-rose
detail: A frankly aromatic rose.

name: fantasque
detail: Eccentric and unreasonable  Fantasque twirls under the bright lights of the ballroom with its sumptuous decor. Be ready to be surprised: Fantasque avoids banality. This singular spirit lives intensely  in complete freedom.

name: ch-pasion-for-him
detail: What would life be without a touch of passion? For Carolina Herrera  it's impossible to conceive. Since the creation of her fashion house in 1981  the New York designer has created a universe of fashion  fragrance and beauty that rejects boredom and celebrates joy  enthusiasm and spontaneity as vital attributes. Her fragrances for women and men  CH Passion  pay homage to that philosophy with a clear objective: to celebrate the Joy of Life that empowers us all to overcome any circumstance. "CH Pasión fragrances are a shot of creative energy for women and men  a love letter to the colours that define our House and an exercise in optimism that invites us to be intrepid. Herrera  Creative Director.

name: cuir-mythique-1
detail: Siberia. A fascinating ride on the Trans-Siberian railway to hunt for exceptional gemstones at the heart of Russia. A journey that left indelible traces  inspiring a bold piece that pairs a mink creation with a 23-carat yellow diamond. Cuir Mythique exudes power and animality  but also the fresh sensation of open land as far as the eye can see.

name: bulle-de-rose-1
detail: Bulle de RoseThe perfume  at once playful and chic  sophisticated and fiery  exudes the youthful grace and subtle elegance of a sophisticated woman. A spritz of Bulle de Rose  like a joyful burst of life  is the last step  the finishing touch before starting the day.

name: mercedes-benz-sign-your-power
detail: Assert yourself with Sign Your Power  the affirmation of self-confidence  the opportunity for each man to leave his mark and be the center of attention.

name: sweet-plum
detail: Feminine  sensual and addictive.

name: gentleman-givenchy-society-extreme
detail: A fragrance created for the most daring members of the Gentleman Society  always in search of adrenaline and surpassing themselves.

name: coffee-queen
detail: Energised  happy  and ready for anything!

name: angelys-pear
detail: With a luminous beauty  a clean air  a calm and serene atmosphere  Angelys Pear perfectly illustrates the gentle atmosphere of Anjou. A fresh and sweet fragrance  with an intense heart  composed of a trail that reveals a chypre signature.

name: national-tide
detail: Forever young.

name: amber-absolute-1
detail: The purest form of amber. A rich  warm and voluptuous composition that will leave you feeling as if you are wearing an exquisite silk fabric against your skin.

name: tabac-28
detail: A deeply aromatic tobacco absolute (imagine a distilled Cuban cigar) combined with a striking woody blend creates a smooth  smoky sensation. The whole creation is lively  vibrant  sensual  even decadent! And it brings another colourful graffiti to Wynwood  Miami  but this one is just for your nostrils.

name: strong-me-6
detail: Strong Me comes with rum and vanilla notes. It's kind of sweet  but tough at the same time.

name: munich-victor
detail: Birkholz presents Munich  an exclusive fragrance creation for the Douglas branch in Munich. This feel-good fragrance blends the woody freshness of Black Weed with the oriental sensuality of Secret Rendezvous. The result is a masterpiece that will keep you coming back for more.

name: orange-blossom-lavender-petitgrain
detail: The unprecedented combination of the calming fragrance of Orange Blossom and the aromatic notes of Lavender  with the soothing accents of Petitgrain as a counterpoint  envelop you in an exquisite and relaxing caress.

name: o-feminin
detail: Sensual  carnal and modern  this chic and bohemian fragrance is an addictive floral treat to wear all seasons.

name: cristal-royal-leau
detail: Crystal Royal L’Eau draws inspiration from nature  capturing the freshness and the carefree spirit of a princess in search of sparkling sensations and shivers of tenderness. A luminous fragrance  like a dive into crystal clear water.

name: metallique
detail: Forged with elegant brilliance  Metallique mesmerizes its admirers with a pulsating flash of modern  resolute femininity; willful  luminous and in full bloom. Sexy  powerful and concentrated  full of high wattage sophistication that gleams with a scintillating seduction ensuring Metallique shines on.
ingredients: ['Heliotrope', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Hawthorn', 'Aldehyde', 'Bergamot', 'Musk', 'Petitgrain', 'Sandalwood', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Vanillin (Vanilla note)']

name: source-of-life-man
detail: A tribute to planet Earth and the beauty of its elements. A fragrance that captures the essence of wet earth notes and gives your senses a vital and invigorating experience. The perfect fragrance for the man who wants to bring a spark of energy into his daily routine.

name: daisy-wild
detail: Embark on an outdoors adventure with Daisy Wild  a bold and feminine fragrance that inspires you to reconnect with nature and embody your young  free-spirited self.

name: villa-sorrento
detail: A splash at Villa Sorrento instantly transports you to an unforgettable summer on the sunny shores of Amalfi. As you rest languidly in the shade of the villa's stone walls  you are mesmerised by the natural beauty of your luxury getaway.

name: jasmin-3
detail: The delicate  lush Jasmine invites us back to the gardens of our childhood. The unique  powdery vase is orchestrated around this poetic flower.

name: oud-alezan
detail: A few years ago  motivated by a desire to overcome her innate fear of horses  Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel went to the stables at the Saut Hermès show-jumping event. When she came to the last stall  a chestnut horse approached he and pressed its head against her face. All at once  her apprehension vanished. With its simple  direct composition  Oud Alezan recreates the emotion of her original sensation.

name: wild-lemon
detail: Freshly picked lemon conveys a fresh scent that connects with the nature of the islands and their agriculture. Enjoy the sensation of being transported to the lemon groves with this perfume.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma-green-stravaganza
detail: Born in Roma Green Stravaganza takes you on a bold adventure to the cool gardens of Roma where you are free to live and express your unique ways.

name: magnolia-au-vetiver-dhaiti
detail: The entrancing floral scent of Magnolia is blended with delicate Vetiver from Haiti to create a fragrance that expresses a surprising complexity.

name: dance-midnight-star-2024
detail: An invitation for all women to shine like a star and illuminate the world with their magnetism and highlight their unique  radiant energy.

name: orchidea-sensuale
detail: An elegant scent with exotic  addictive accords.

name: peach-honey
detail: Discover the secret and sensuality of Peach Honey  a noble combination of warm and sweet tones.

name: bloom-30950
detail: A dazzling olfactory creation as captivating as a bouquet of colourful blooms.

name: vibrant-musk
detail: Unique and unforgettably compelling  Vibrant Musk dives into the world of molecular perfumery and sets the stage for a special classic in the art.
ingredients: ['Musk', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Norlimbanol (Woody ambery)', 'Cedarwood', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Black Pepper']

name: supaer-1
detail: Supaer is one in a series of powerful elixirs that redefine contemporary perfumery as we know it. Based on a single ingredient  Iso E Super  this rich-yet-light  pleasantly bitter  woody fragrance can be worn alone or personalised for an individual edge.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Menthanyl Acetate (Mint)', 'Ethyl Acetate (Fruity notes)', 'Phenyl Oxide']

name: crepuscule-des-ames
detail: Profound dilemma. Animalic suggestion. Autumnal light. Danaë  indolent like a serpent  dancing. Chaos! Crépuscule des Âmes is the twilight of the souls and a perfume to enslave the senses.

name: imperial-patchouli
detail: Imperial Patchouli is a refined  gentle fragrance with a modern  balanced scent.

name: chiffon-sorbet-2024
detail: Chiffon Sorbet 2024 is a unique twist on the original 1993 fragrance. A fruitier composition that evokes the sun  the sea and a soft summer breeze.

name: sisterland-pink-raspberry-1
detail: Sweet  delicate  and spontaneous. Pink Raspberry is the sweetest of your sisters. You’re hooked on her feminine bouquet of white flowers  which mixes perfectly with raspberry and the woody notes that let her personality shine through.

name: eclat-darpege-mon-eclat
detail: Mon Éclat opens a unique chapter of Éclat d'Arpège  created in 2002. Faithful to the codes that marked the success of its predecessor  Mon Éclat is a unique composition inspired by the key words dear to the House: love  happiness  femininity  radiance and Parisian elegance.

name: bronze-goddess-nuit-2022
detail: Bronze Goddess Nuit explores the depths of desire as the sun sets on a private island paradise. A sensational landscape of endless beaches illuminates under the stars. The twilight is yours for the taking.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Bergamot', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Lady Of The Night Flower', 'Pink Pepper', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Coconut', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)']

name: gelsomino-eau-de-parfum
detail: This is the story of Cosimo III de Medici and his dear “Stufa dei Mugherini”. This is a love story: the jasmine that struck the Granduca’s senses was of a special variety  that came from Goa in 1688. More similar to a small rose than a classic jasmine  it had a special greenhouse built for it and was only propagated by Cosimo III's trusted gardeners.

name: orange-blossom-1
detail: Orange Blossom is an irresistible fragrance with a unique scent that will accompany you throughout the day.

name: six
detail: Distinguish yourself with this classic woody aromatic fragrance featuring robust notes intertwined with a deep royal blend of incense and agarwood.

name: perfect-tobacco
detail: Perfect Tobacco epitomises absolute elegance and pure luxury.

name: oud-nejma-2
detail: The second daughter of Nejma  Two is an oriental fragrance at the crossroads of oriental culture and the sophistication of perfume standards  a truly hedonistic elixir.

name: vetiver-dhiver
detail: Inspired by a mirage-like garden in the winter of Saint Petersburg  Vétiver d'Hiver is a luminous fragrance  with the alternation of dry textures and fresh sensations  green leaves rising out of the burning desert sand  elegant like a gentleman.

name: born-to-be-unforgettable
detail: An explosion of cola freshness that recreates the experience of a sparkling cola sip. It hits like an explosion  sparkles like true character and takes a classic cola into exciting new sensations. A scented creation featuring a cool and confident attitude impossible to forget.

name: pink-grapefruit-1
detail: Pink Grapefruit is an effervescent waterfall of citrus nuances that meet shades of elegant flowers and enveloping musky notes. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: limen
detail: “I have always been inspired by the world around me  the places I've been to  the places I dream of. The French Riviera has an indelible romantic quality  it is a place of charm  beauty  and style. I wanted to capture its spirit of excitement and artistic expression ” Ralph Lauren.

name: phantom-intense
detail: Phantom Intense continues the evolution of the Phantom  man while entering a new olfactive frontier with a fresher  more strongly aromatic inflection. Blended with exceptional ingredients by globally renowned perfumers Paul Guerlain  Juliette Karagueuzoglou  Anne Flipo and Dominque Ropion  Phantom Intense defies expectations to define a new facet of powerful masculinity.

name: 803-embruns-gingembre-patchouli
detail: This multi-faceted scent evokes a patchouli leaf captured in ice.

name: musc-ambre-gris-1
detail: Known for its unmistakable scent  ambergris is even more precious when it is "aged"  as its qualities are enhanced after years of floating in the sun of the Pacific Ocean. Affinessence has chosen the exceptional quality of this perfume  using it generously enough to express its irresistible power of attraction.

name: olivier-cresp
detail: A fascinating scent inspired by the arts and exquisite aesthetics.

name: nina-fleur
detail: A scent full of positive energy and inspired by Nina Ricci's bold and unique fashion collections.

name: white-tea-bergamot-freesia-1
detail: A delicate fragrance that exudes the sweetness and freshness of bergamot and freesia. The bittersweet  sharp  warm aromatic notes are highly appreciated by perfumers. Evokes scents of warm Mediterranean nights.

name: feminite-du-bois
detail: "This scent expresses the masculine side of femininity and vice-versa. It's all about cedar. Wood accounted for 60% of the composition. Amazed  people called it revolutionary. The fragrance took on its own identity  which is the one thing that really matters to me." Serge Lutens.

name: rose-de-nuit-1
detail: If my perfume were a colour  it would be yellow gold. If my perfume were a piece of music  it would be 'The Firebird' by Stravinsky. If it were a book  'A Thousand and One Nights'. If it were a palace  the Alhambra in Granada. Here  coyness is excluded. The celebration of the senses can begin. Harmonious  powerful  feminine  spellbinding. I envisioned the perfume as a sensual woman  and nothing else.

name: bergamot-rose
detail: This fresh and delicate scent awakens the imagination and the most profound feeling of love.

name: la-vie-est-belle-rose-extraordinaire
detail: La Vie Est Belle Rose Extraordinaire is a reinterpretation of the rose  Lancôme's iconic flower. “This Extraordinaire version retains the codes of La vie est belle  a gourmand iris. This main accord is shaped to make it brighter  more modern  with an added touch of magic ” Anne Flipo  co-Perfumer.

name: libre-eau-de-toilette
detail: Because freedom is more relevant now than it ever was. It resonates in a personal  emotional  intimate manner. More than a state of mind  it's a way to live. To feel everything on your skin. To embrace who you are  your emotions  your desires. Burning bright. Feeling right. Smelling marvellous all the while  in the radiant sillage of Libre Eau de Toilette.

name: vanille-de-zanzibar
detail: Vanille de Zanzibar is a voluptuous and addictive fragrance. Like Zanzibar  the wild pearl of Africa  an island bursting with spices  this fragrance sends the senses into a spiraling vertigo.

name: evasion-azul
detail: Feel the refreshing freedom of Evasión Azul through its citrus top notes and elegant  smooth and crisp heart notes that will enhance your personality. In the background  warm woods come together to give you a sense of well-being. An essential water that will purify you.

name: bois-de-yuzu-1
detail: Bois de Yuzu fascinates with its citrusy top notes dominating a warm  woody heart of yuzu wood and sage. Natural  masculine and captivating.

name: valentino-donna-born-in-roma-green-stravaganza
detail: Born in Roma Green Stravaganza takes you on a bold adventure to the cool gardens of Roma where you are free to live and express your unique ways.

name: vanille-insensee
detail: He pushed through the crowd when suddenly his heart skipped a beat. That smell. It was hers. He had worn it first until she stole it from him. Now  there she was  before him  and the magic of years gone by came over him in an instant.

name: karl-lagerfeld-pour-femme-rouge
detail: Rouge is “unique  modern and captivating ” as described by perfumer Romain Almairac  who developed the scent. He was inspired by Karl Lagerfeld’s multifaceted universe  where different dimensions collide to create fascinating paradoxes.

name: aetheroxyde-1
detail: Aetheroxyde. Far  far away  you can vaguely smell a beautiful fresh and contemporary wood; closer  there is this strange "ether chord"  a kind of soft vapour  which approaches the skin like a breath of burnt wood. An emanation of love. "What if peace had a smell?" she asked me  a little worried. "It could be like that " I replied.
ingredients: ['Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Woody Notes', 'Ethyl Acetate (Fruity notes)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)']

name: aextra
detail: An ethereal love potion unisex fragrance resulting in a unique perfume stimulating desire.

name: celluloid-1
detail: "I love Los Angeles. I love Hollywood. They're beautiful. They're all plastic  but I love plastic. I want to be plastic. Andy Warhol
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Ethyl Acetate (Fruity notes)']

name: midnight-oud
detail: Midnight Oud is a powerful fragrance dominated by warm  woody notes combined with herbs  citrus and florals. The base notes create a very masculine signature.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Bergamot', 'Sandalwood', 'Amber', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Rose', 'Moss', 'Clary Sage', 'Tobacco Leaf']

name: linterdit-millesime-tubereuse-noire-2024
detail: Tubéreuse Noire captures the intangible aroma of burnt tuberose petals. A spiral of smoke entwines itself around L’Interdit’s signature scent  recreating the smell of a smouldering  carnal tuberose engulfed in flames.

name: tuberose
detail: An energising perfume  ideal for fighting negative energy and enhancing optimism.

name: felicita-apricot
detail: Felicità Apricot is a fragrance that seduces the senses with its radiant energy and sensual depth.

name: tutti-twilly-dhermes
detail: Created by Christine Nagel for the Hermès girls  Tutti Twilly d'Hermès eau de parfum is a tribute to their free spirit: a blend of daring and lightheartedness  and their multifaceted nature.

name: swiss-army-for-her-ginger-lily
detail: Vibrant and bursting with a zest for life  Swiss Army for Her Ginger Lily is a fragrance of undeniable energy and class. Radiant and straightforward with a resoundingly natural confidence  spray it on and shine bright and bold  wherever your adventures take you today.

name: geranium-pour-monsieur
detail: Like the eccentric Englishman in a blue velvet jacket  pink striped shirt  and a cashmere-print pocket square  this perfume is an extravagant unraveling of colours and textures.

name: sunflowers-summer-air-1
detail: Sunflowers Summer Air is inspired by the cool  refreshing breeze that gently brushes the earth  inviting flowers to dance and leaves to sway. Wrap yourself in the essence of laughter and pure joy. There is no place you'd rather be.

name: stella-mccartney-pop-1
detail: "POP is a spirit. It's about celebrating that exciting time when you are coming into your own. It's about freedom  and starting your life away from judgements or labels. Together as one  these strong young women are a force to be reckoned with." - Stella McCartney

name: bois-de-violette
detail: A perfume dominated by violet leaves and flowers  blending with cedarwood and its cool spices  peppery notes of Indonesian cloves  cardamom  honey  orange blossoms and musk. This astonishing  lively perfume remade with hint of violet on a cedar base.

name: cedarwood-absinth
detail: A rich leathery fragrance unashamedly herbaceous  sultry and powerful.

name: portrait-sandal-1
detail: The feeling of belonging lingers long after you are gone. My being is in your portrait.

name: aoud-s-1
detail: The juxtaposition of cool and warm notes compete in this vibrant fragrance  creating a warm veil of leather on the skin.

name: pepe-jeans-london-calling-for-him
detail: A vibrant scent inspired by the city of London with an unexpected and edgy British bitter sweetness.

name: mr-burberry-element
detail: Mr. Burberry ElementA fragrance that fuses modern strength and green freshness. Captured in a modern  masculine and fresh campaign that draws inspiration from the beautiful symmetry of British nature.

name: santal-noble
detail: The blend of sandalwood with gourmand notes and spices unveils a subtle  intense and sensual fragrance.

name: pulse-action
detail: Pulse Action is for those who like to innovate  take risks  and go further. The perfect inspiration for the man who sets his own path.

name: poivre-noir-1
detail: Peppery  exhilarating  elegant. Poivre Noir is the perfect scent to rediscover the taste of oneself!

name: black-pepper-2
detail: Luxurious  subtle and mysterious  like the peppercorns themselves.

name: vanilla-black-pepper-1
detail: The sensational expression of opposites and contrasts. The uniting alchemy of black and white.

name: heliotrope-2
detail: Heliotrope is a revitalising blend  as fragrant as custard cream  as radiant as the Mediterranean dawn.

name: dates-delight-1
detail: A tribute to the fruity symbol of sweetness in a composition that is the portrait of falling in love. Through the eyes of the lover  each figure softens and becomes unique and incomparably precious. In this fragrance  live the velvety love caress with a sensual touch of passion. Dates Delight whispers to the heart of those who know how to listen to the true voice of love.

name: sea-salt-caramel-1
detail: The salty-sweet fragrance is the harmonic  penetrating and refreshing sea breeze  interrupted by a few drops of thick caramel. Playful and flirty sweetness to evoke the picture of carefree joy.

name: nice-feelings
detail: Nice Feelings invites you into the depths of the ocean with its delightfully enchanting  and fresh notes that bring visions of splashing waves and the vastness of serene blue skies.

name: agrumes-tresor
detail: Agrumes & Tresor is a revitalising fragrance and a real treasure of nature with woody and aromatic scents.

name: blue-sage-lime-fir-wood-1
detail: The Greeks and Romans considered sage the king of plants. It embodies within its character wisdom and power.

name: chocman-mint
detail: Chocman Mint is a perfect blend of exotic fruits  gentle floral compositions and a love affair between coffee and chocolate.

name: eclat-nuit-for-her
detail: Experience the heightened sensuality of Parisian nights with Eclat Nuit for Her  the sophisticated eau de parfum that captures the allure of Paris by night. Timeless yet chic  this scent exudes modern elegance with an alluring trail  wherever the night takes you.

name: flora-gorgeous-jasmine-2022
detail: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine bursts with a radiant composition led by jasmine grandiflorum. A scent full of joyful serenity.

name: le-magnolia-de-rosine
detail: Le Magnolia de Rosine is a delicate fragrance for the natural woman who seeks authenticity wherever she goes.

name: here-to-stay
detail: Here to Stay is a fragrance with a radiant floral heart note with an unforgettable finish. The perfect scent for all the strong and self-confident women out there.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-blanc-eau-intense-pour-lui
detail: A charismatic  sensual scent with a powerful trail.

name: mirror-x-kaws
detail: Mirror is a special collaboration between Comme des Garçons and the American artist Kaws. Inspired by Kaws’s multi-faceted practice  the scent brings a complex blend of optimistic fragrant notes together to create a unique experience.

name: f2
detail: A nostalgic scent that evokes the love of grandparents and the freedom of children.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Lemon', 'Patchouli', 'Rose', 'Aldehyde', 'Amber', 'Benzoin', 'Bergamot', 'Copahu Balm / Copaïba', 'Curcuma (Turmeric)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Myrrh', 'Narcissus', 'Neroli', 'Opoponax', 'Vanilla', 'Pine Needles', 'Cinnamon', 'Civet', 'Galbanum', 'Heliotrope', 'Iris / Orris', 'Mimosa', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Palmarosa', 'Plum', 'Wisteria']

name: sacred-scarab-attar-2023
detail: This remarkable attar version of the acclaimed Sacred Scarab Extrait de Parfum features a richer and more nuanced scent. Its grandeur is like no other  capturing the essence of admiration and luxurious sophistication. An impeccable choice for those seeking a singularly special scent.

name: gula
detail: Gulala is the essence of self-indulgence and the devouring of life itself.

name: sung-homme-1
detail: Sung Homme is a scent for the self-confident man  a classic scent to reflect the success  style and individuality of the spirited man of today.

name: blackpepper-3
detail: Blackpepper is intoxicatingly warm and mysterious. A compelling blend of earth tones and invigorating spice  Black Pepper is sophisticated and long-lasting. A scent that is hypnotic  addictive and defiantly bold.

name: santal-calling
detail: Perfumer Antoine Maisondieu explores the unique properties of sandalwood album from Australia. His idea was to mix contemporary Parisian inspirations with the mystical energy of this ingredient to create a bright and soothing scent that leads to an ultimate addiction.

name: santal-2
detail: The fragrance generated by the Australian sandalwood offers a scent that conjures meditation. The perfume evolves from a warm base of musk and blossoms with a sustained heart of green herbs. Its sunny top notes display Mediterranean essences of green citrus and woody notes.

name: 1-million-pacman-collector-edition
detail: The 1 Million man is flamboyant  daring and uses his charm to play with a touch of humour. He loves the feeling of exploring new sensations  his dreams and fantasies always take him further.

name: avon-prime-1
detail: Imbued with the alluring power of a stylish  attractive and seductive man  this fragrance exudes a powerful and sensual charisma from the first impression to the last.

name: vra-vra-vroom
detail: A word of warning: you may find that everything feels possible. As if inhabited by a dose of blooming spring and a spoonful of the invigorating enthusiasms  your energy is in abundance. This is a nation without borders  the possibilities are limitless  and a state where all feel free will. The re-dynamism of your daydreams  a quest fulfilled. Impatience replaces hesitancy. Energetic osmanthus mixed with citrus unveils a succulent invigorating vitality. Apricot notes ricochet with woodiness. Magnolia blooms by the spoonful. Nothing can stop you now. Abundant enthusiasm and energy sign the day.

name: blue-talisman-2023
detail: Designed as a hypnotic jewel  Blue Talisman is a cutting edge fragrance symbol of an infinite spiritual energy.

name: musc-k
detail: Musc K was born in the Maranhão landscape  where the pristine white sands of the wind-sculpted dunes contrast with the many crystal-clear shades of blue  from aquamarine and turquoise to the emerald green of the lagoons.

name: atomic-rose-1
detail: Another prime example of Initio's ability to find the harmonic balance between beauty and potency  Atomic Rose is rich  sexy  vivacious  and utterly unforgettable.

name: acqua-decima
detail: Celebrate the spirit of Italy itself with Acqua Decima. Quintessentially Mediterranean  like the scented notes that greet us along the Paths of Gods  the specatular mountain walk that link the Amalfi coast with the Bay of Sorrento  through cliffs in the wilderness over a glimmering blue sea.

name: petitgrain-1
detail: This sexy  warm citrus is our modern take on the classic petitgrain fragrance. A dynamic and complex blend of traditional citrus combined with delicate green flowers and soft woods for a refreshing  contemporary feel. Sensual and aromatic  this luxurious unisex fragrance lasts from morning until late at night.

name: terres-aromatiques-1905
detail: In 1905 Rene Lalique met François Coty. This relationship resulted in beautifully designed perfume bottles and the modern perfume industry was born. This fragrance respects influences  in Coty's creations  from the land and environments of Provence and Corsica.

name: pineapple-2
detail: This Demeter fragrance is the full  fresh and juicy heart of the pineapple  so bursting with flavor and fragrance that you will swear it was squeezed from the ripe fruit itself only moments earlier. Originally unique to the western hemisphere  the pineapple is now grown and enjoyed in tropical climates throughout the world. Indeed  the pineapple industry is the second largest in Hawaii today  after tourism.

name: endless-1
detail: A quiet  uneventful moment can be transforming. A simple bunch of flowers can be breathtaking. A warm hug can make everything okay. There's just no end to the power of being lovely. An unforgettable moment. Endless is a sparkling fragrant celebration that's in love with life. Overflowing with flowers. Infinitely joyful.

name: patchouli-9
detail: Patchoulila legend and elegance. Symbol of freedom  arty perfume  timeless fragrance that has marked generations of women.

name: cedar-violet-1
detail: Cedar Violet evokes a spontaneous walk through golden woodlands  close to nature and its spectacular verdancy.

name: ck-one-summer-daze-2022
detail: Summer Daze invites you along for the ultimate summer road trip. Discover new landscapes. Chase a romantic sunset. Laugh under the stars with friends. There’s nothing more liberating than the open road.

name: sun-men-lavender-vetiver-2021
detail: A fragrance inspired by the warmth of summer days and the light blue of the sea. An invitation to stay into the freshness of summer.

name: invincible-bergamot
detail: Invincible Bergamot captures the soft power of a suede jacket. A powerful and modern scent that epitomises infinite allure.

name: onyx-mcm
detail: Synonymous with the powerful gemstone  MCM Onyx inspires energy  empowerment and strength. A futuristic woody fougère born from the fusion between luxury craftsmanship and new-tech perfumery  the scent nurtures confidence and personal convictions  inviting you to dare to make a statement!

name: lavande-altitude
detail: Lavende Altitude awakens the senses and transports you to the heart of the lavender fields of Provence - this fragrance is a real gem!

name: diorissimo-eau-de-toilette
detail: As bright as a spring morning  this romantic floral bouquet enhances the freshness of lily of the valley  the lucky flower of Christian Dior and the emblem of his Couture House.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: untitled-rose
detail: This floral fragrance is a declaration of love to all women.

name: kenzo-homme-eau-de-toilette-marine
detail: Kenzo Homme Eau de Toilette Marine is the scent of a sunny and salty summer day. Inspired by the sensuality of skin emerging from the ocean  fresh and full of salt  it transports us to a place of letting go and escape.

name: more-marine-1
detail: This fragrance evokes the freshness of the ocean. The ultimate masculine fragrance.

name: lalique-white-in-black-1
detail: An icon for a new generation who’s not afraid to break the codes of classic masculinity. Lalique celebrates the casual-chic elegance of today’s generation with a bracing  high-contrast fragrance  for a man who’s not afraid to embrace all of his facets and contradictions.

name: vetiver-elemi
detail: Our organic vetiver scent has aphrodisiac properties blending natural pheromones. This unique formulation with elemi above makes this sensual vetiver a popular scent for both men and women.

name: jaguar-gold-in-black-for-men
detail: A powerful scent full of contrasts.

name: bohemian-infusion
detail: Bohemian Infusion was inspired by the stories of the Piazza at Covent Garden in the 19th and early 20th centuries  when it was a playground for sinful and decadent pleasures. Elegant and romantic  yet exuberant and libertine  this bold scent seduces you without you even noticing.

name: musc-panache
detail: An intimate musk that the perfumer could almost have created for himself.

name: honeysuckle-dream
detail: A fragrance inspired by beautiful spring morning that will awaken your optimistic spirit.

name: lily-eau-de-parfum-lumiere-1
detail: With this feminine inspiration  Lily Eau de Parfum Lumière brings the luminosity and intensity of the orange blossom. Made by and for women  who together find their way forward in sisterhood.

name: life-calm
detail: Life Calm connects all the senses with a calming hug to the soul  providing a feeling of relaxation.

name: lov-u-date-night
detail: A unique fragrance that reflects the thrill of a candle-lit dinner after a long workday  or a spontaneous bouquet of flowers.

name: modern-muse-le-rouge-gloss
detail: Modern Muse Le Rouge Gloss has been created with a touch of charged sensuality and high shine to vibrate with sex appeal.

name: wild-rosinda
detail: Beneath the fluttering blush of Liberty’s Decadent Blooms print lies a feast of roses and peonies  so generous that even the most gentle of taps could ignite a kaleidoscope of scarlet confetti. Be beguiled by this rich and mysterious floral scent with notes of hot saffron  patchouli and smouldering wood  guaranteed to make a statement.

name: gramercy-park
detail: New York's Gramercy Park  a gated private residential square  has inspired this fragrance  preferred by the city man or woman who seeks out simplicity and cultivates dressed-down good tastes.

name: golf-1
detail: A sparkling and aromatic fragrance  reminiscent of the pleasing scent that wafts in the air when walking in a green meadow between one golf swing and another.

name: n-3-iris-luminoso
detail: The essence of the most vivid nature to enjoy the refreshing aroma of flowers all year round.

name: honour-43-woman
detail: Like poetry in motion. Formulated slowly and with intent  this precious elixir is an awakening for the senses.

name: delicious-rhubarb-rose-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A slice of crimson summer cake. Freshly picked roses on the pantry table. Scattered crumbs of puff pastry and bright ribbons of rhubarb stalk  Delight your senses with an irresistibly sweet recipe with a citrus twist.

name: rabarbaro-rhubarb
detail: A simple yet magnificent plant  Rhubarb reveals its dual nature at first glance  with its contrasting colours: from the deep green of its broad leaves to the brighter green of its streaked stems  which then turn to a purplish red. It has a fresh and herbaceous aroma and a slightly sour taste. A combination of contrasting sensations that we have gathered and added to the Rabarbaro perfume  pungent and bittersweet just like the air you breathe when walking at dawn  in a lush vegetable garden filled with plants and crisp herbs.

name: oud-safran-1
detail: Oud Safran has been designed for a certain state of mind  or a great occasion.

name: encens
detail: Rooted in classic ingredients  Encens by Rag & Bone introduces a curious twist on an iconic scent. A novel combination of incense over confident woods.

name: muskethanol
detail: Muskethanol. A semblance of realism: a handful of golden sand poured in alcohol (damascenone) that begins to shimmer  as if by magic  a thousand sequins  a silvery glow similar to that of the sea. The disturbing impression of a sand that has become almost abstract. An arena of steel  futuristic  perhaps from another world.

name: j4sm1ne-x-cal4mus-1
detail: Two types of jasmine grow in a lake surrounded by aquatic plants. Acorus calamus was the only one to witness the first blooming of its new neighbours. And it seemed they wanted to grow together to create a new mutant specimen.

name: abysse
detail: Looking into the wells of the great vertigo  reddened by a perfume of the abyss. An endless story  a bottomless faith. From the darkness emerges an imperious perfume  black  orange  abstract.

name: vanhera-1
detail: Vanherauna Dark Vanilla  an unexpected fragrance that evokes intriguing and unclear sensations. A journey around one of the most iconic notes in perfumery. A Vanilla perfume  not the usual Vanilla fragrance with only sweet notes. A battle  a conflict between ingredients.

name: divine-vanille-by-olivier-pescheux
detail: Divine Vanille is a tribute to the sustainably harvested absolute vanilla from Madagascar. Mysterious  soft  deep  carnal... this perfume is simply irresistible.
ingredients: ['Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Cinnamon', 'Tonka Bean', 'Benzoin (Siam)', 'Osmanthus', 'Pomarose (Apple Rosy note)', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Cedarwood (Texas)']

name: orom-1
detail: Orom is an expression of each person’s own inner magic  an empowering scent that reminds its wearer that all one needs exists within.

name: so-suede
detail: An exploration of suede leather  timeless yet ultra-contemporary. Some vintage leather references may be present but yet  So Suede delivers a totally modern message of strength  nobility and elegance. A masculine elegance that can be shared by all. Or is it that sheer feminine audacity desired by all?

name: suede-pony
detail: Be yourself with Suede Pony. A blend of sophistication and irreverent optimism  this fragrance is about making your own way in life. Sometimes you have to break away from the herd and be your own lonely stallion.

name: tuscan-suede
detail: "I always wanted to smell the delicious delicacy of expensive suede on men and women and think of the closeness of the skin " Azzi Glasser  perfumer.

name: suede-pear
detail: Suede Pear is a unique twist on the cool scent of soft pear flesh wrapped in suede.

name: black-suede-touch-1
detail: Black Suede Touch will warm your senses and melt your heart. Let the romance begin with this modern blend of spice and woody notes that is made even more sensual with a hint of creamy gourmands.

name: daim-blond
detail: "As blond as a Swede  as yellow as corn silk  as gold as the sun or a golden boy or whatever else you can imagine! Let's do what children do. First  a child looks at an object. He picks it up. If he brings it to his nose  as he would this soft suede scent  it's in search of consolation. That's exactly what I want my fragrance to do!" - Serge Lutens

name: sueded-oud-1
detail: "Bushman's Candle was the inspiration for this fragrance. Its unique olfactive character includes inflections of warm woods  incense  and amber. We worked within the structure  accentuating the spices and adding nuances of light oud notes  resulting in a modern scent impression that celebrates the richness of ancient ingredients " Claude Dir  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Suede', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Magnolia', 'Night Blooming Jasmine', "Bushman's Candle", 'Amber', 'Birch', 'Cypress', 'Honeysuckle', 'Patchouli', 'Pimento', 'Praline', 'Skin Accord']

name: blue-gardenia-1
detail: The fragrance opens with bright citrus notes. The heart is illuminated by a bouquet of elegant white flowers. In the base  ambery accords are embraced by precious woods.
ingredients: ['Gardenia', 'Night Blooming Jasmine', 'Petitgrain', 'Sandalwood', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Magnolia', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose', 'Bergamot', 'Amber', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Musk']

name: white-gardenia-7
detail: Native to the Far East  India  and China  gardenia flowers have always been known and admired for their outstanding fragrance  and intense  In the language of flowers  gardenia gives the message of hidden love and it is a sign of pureness and honesty. It's a floral bouquet  extremely feminine and elegant  is refreshed by a citrus touch  and enveloped by a soft woody musky accord.

name: infusion-de-mandarine
detail: Like the delicious mandarin orange it reflects  Infusion de Mandarine stands out in a collection of classics: immediately timeless and totally unconventional.

name: amber-teutonic
detail: From Mahler's hut perched above valleys of alpine fir trees. The horn resounded in the ancient forest. A Nibelungen treasure of precious emerald amber.

name: vanille-noire-du-mexique
detail: Sparkling and refined  this powdery fragrance is the ideal gift for a gentle and elegant woman.

name: ambre-secret
detail: An ode to escape that stimulates the senses to the doors of hot countries and tropical forests.

name: eau-lente-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: An imaginary voyage back to the time of Alexander the Great when  at night  spices and resins were burned. The smoke took on its sweet  balmy accents that soothed the soul and offered rest to the body. Slowly  they prepared for the following day and the great conquests to come.

name: resina-1
detail: A reckless composition made from a blend of several resins. The result is a rich and sumptuous blend full of spicy and subtle notes resulting in a resin scent that is the sum of them all  making for an avant-garde and daring fragrance.
ingredients: ['Elemi', 'Opoponax', 'Benzoin (Siam)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ginger', 'Nutmeg', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Coffee', 'Rooibos Red Tea', 'Star Anise']

name: anice-verde
detail: A creation that intensifies the spicy note of star anise  intersecting it with magnificent luminous flowers  fruity brushstrokes and creamy woody notes.

name: harrods-for-him-1
detail: A tribute to Harrods' vision and ingenuity that this iconic luxury emporium  the epitome of London shopping – and shopping anywhere  according to many retail connoisseurs – should reach across the Atlantic to New York. Bond No. 9 Harrods for Him captures both the future-oriented spirit of 21st century Harrods and the eclectic downtown vibe of Bond No. 9.

name: just-for-you-pour-homme
detail: A timeless classic that is a tribute to manly elegance and natural charisma. Just for You will quickly become an indispensable part of your personality.

name: ink-1
detail: For those who have fallen under the spell of tattoos  they are much more than body adornment: they are a reminder of a time  a place  a fleeting moment that becomes a permanent memory. Cool and seductive  Ink is a fragrance that will transport you back to the day of your first tattoo  whenever you want.

name: black-tea
detail: Black Tea is an elegant traveler. Spicy  woody  an intriguing mix of wanderlust and timeless style. An evocative  masculine blend of spices  leather  and tobacco inspired by Britain’s historic spice and tea routes. Satisfyingly rich in scent  without overpowering the senses.

name: les-racines-du-male
detail: Les Racines du Mâle is a mystical  venomous vetiver that rises into a complex  resinous and warm vapour. The product of an olfactory autogenesis  a chimerical note that the perfumer neither conceived nor anticipated  an unexpected “leathery wave” extends like a shadow over the composition  bringing it elegance and mystery

name: essencial-palo-santo-masculino-1
detail: An intense and exuberant fragrance that celebrates one of the most fragrant woods in the world  used to attract prosperity  open paths  and celebrate achievements.

name: electric-sky-1
detail: Electric Sky captures the essence of freedom. Vibrant and rapturous  like the energy after a storm  it is an unexpected mix of refreshing and warm scents. Electric Sky is one of five scents in the Essence of Dreams collection  celebrating the power of dreams.

name: mmw
detail: Matthew M. Williams  Creative Director of Givenchy's women's and men's collections  has inspired a fragrance that reflects the energy of his creations for the House: bold and elegant. Signed with the initials MMW  a name that sounds like a code for connoisseurs  this bewitching fragrance will seduce with its ultra-contemporary and chic touch. ?

name: palissandre-night
detail: "I have always loved the night and the intensity it can bring to perfumes. These are unique moments for a creator. I wanted us to get straight into the emotion. The composition is therefore thought of as a block  with simple writing to plunge into this nocturnal and comforting mystery where the leading role is given to woody notes " Alberto Morillas  Perfumer.

name: momentum-unbreakable
detail: He’s cool. He’s hot. A restless urban cool-hunter  who’d rather rock a sleek black leather jacket and jeans than a suit and tie. The Momentum Unbreakable man doesn’t follow the buzz: he creates it. Trends? He makes them or breaks them. And if all eyes turn to him wherever he appears  it’s not because he tries: it’s because he is who he is.

name: lambre-des-fleurs
detail: An ambery nectar harvested at dusk in a field of tuberoses and everlasting flowers.

name: aqua-motu-intense-1
detail: Aqua Motu Intense will take you to where the sands soak into the invigorating ocean seas in search of something different. A pleasure for lovers of escape.

name: giallo-elicriso
detail: During one of her walks along the Adriatic coast  Elisa Gera  the life and soul of Acca Kappa  fell in love with the originality and refined perfume of the Mediterranean seedling and chose to transform it into a precious fragrance  Giallo Elicriso: a masculine scent that exudes all the goodness  sensuality and magic of the Mediterranean.

name: sables
detail: “I am at the seashore  I’m having a nap. Wild everlasting flowers are growing in the sand. The sun is blazing  the air is filled with a warm  salty tang and the scent of pine resin.” With these words  Annick Goutal captured a moment of happiness with her husband in Corsica. Sables was born from this emotion.

name: agape
detail: Agape is a creation dedicated to all those chosen souls in harmony with the universe.

name: arsenico
detail: Arsenico. The lethal weapon of seduction encompassed in a drop of scent.

name: marguerite-de-sanremo
detail: A colourful and simple fragrance.

name: peony-1
detail: Elegant  sensual  and chic.

name: garofano-2
detail: "For me  Garofano is a surprising floral-spicy  a carnation-scented fragrance with unexpected depth and radiance " Lorenzo Villoresi  Perfumer.

name: glamour-chic
detail: With subtlety  Glamour Chic blends a floral and powdery scent with an avant-garde touch. The scent opens with the original melody before giving way to a rich bouquet of flowers and dense shade and warming up with woody notes. Glamour Chic epitomises contemporary elegance.

name: coco-figue-1
detail: The aroma and sensuality of fresh coconut mingle with the fruity and gourmand scents of fig for 100% pleasure.

name: cacao-azteque-1
detail: Cacao Aztèque is a non-traditional essence blended with spices  creating an airy intoxicating scent that will heighten your senses.

name: smoking-hot
detail: At night  there are no rules but one: just be Smoking Hot! This fragrance is a truly caramelized delight. It features Kentucky Tobacco Absolute  infused with a hookah drag of Apple-flavoured shisha tobacco and intense Bourbon Vanilla. Evoking everything from European clubs to Eastern hookah lounges  Smoking Hot redefines what a smokey scent is today  going almost where it’s too hot to handle.

name: baldessarini-bella-absolu
detail: This floral and feminine fragrance aims to transform the wearer. The "queen of the night" enchants the world with her natural confidence and dazzling grace. Sumptuous  the Baldessarini Bella Absolu experience highlights feminine strength and charm.

name: people-are-people
detail: Christian is using his latest fragrance  People Are People  to spread his message of inclusion. A fragrance for everyone: "I love you for being you"

name: mediterranean-cypress-1
detail: When you dive off a boat in the harbor to swim to shore. There is a strip of sand between the sea and a cypress grove that casts a fragrant shadow over the bay. On the hill behind this little corner of paradise  you catch a glimpse of the white sun-baked walls of a Mediterranean town. Persistent and mysterious.

name: oui-juicy-couture-play-rosy-darling
detail: For the girl who is forever in love with herself  radiate confidence with this floral and adorable scent. Say OUI (YES) to following your heart  darling!

name: ambrette-9
detail: Ambrette 9 is undeniably the most precious baby formula in the world as it is based mainly on the Ambrette grain  the only musky scent made by nature itself and almost impossible to find. Lightly perfumed  the signature of this formula is fresh and soft thanks to a combination of citrus and fruit that gives Baby (and Mummy) a very special fragrance. A baby perfumed by Le Labo. How cool can you get?

name: ombre-bleue-loriginal-1
detail: The perfume of vacations  beaches and distant journeys. Sun-filled memories mingle with the purity of the islands  and many other scents. Ombre Bleue resembles a flutter of wings or a light ripple of leaves.
ingredients: ['Carnation', 'Jasmine', 'Sand Accord', 'Lily', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose (Grasse)', 'Amber', 'Vanilla', 'Balsamic Notes', 'Benzoin (Siam)', 'Cedarwood', 'Dried Fruits', 'Honey', 'Musk', 'Styrax']

name: rose-parfum-1
detail: "I wanted to create a very modern Rose  which never stops unfolding  like the flower itself  slowly opening to reveal all its beauty " Roja Dove.

name: rose-safran-1
detail: A fragrance with powerful and captivating accents but subtle. This fragrance is inspired by Saffron  a precious and rare spice  unfolding its deep  intoxicating notes  associated with the Rose with the "hundred leaves" of Grasse of which only the depth has been preserved  underlined with a trace of freshness.

name: cologne-bigarade
detail: Following the pioneering work of Edmond Roudnitska  Jean-Claude Ellena based his innovative approach to eau de toilette on a bitter orange essence that had never been used before. The fragrance revolves around the concept of bitter freshness. Stripped of its essential hesperidic notes of bitter orange  faceted by faint hints of rose and set on a base of hay and cedar  the fragrance pushes the idea of bitter freshness to its limits.

name: higher-peace-1
detail: The Higher Peace fragrance by 19-69 and Camp High is inspired by the Santa Monica Canyon and the documentary film Tripping with Ken Kesey. The fragrance is a collaboration between Greg Dacyshyn/Camp High and Johan Bergelin/19-69. The scent is hemp  leafy and plasticine.

name: chergui-1
detail: South Morocco. The hazy white sun infuses torpor on a still diffused land. Miniature tornadoes improvise a ballet  dancing across the sands  roll  turn and then vanish. They are the Djinn  the genies of Good and Evil. They usher in the Chergui  a dry wind from the East. Burning  roiling  mica-laden knots form a curtain of red sand. The Chergui withdraws  followed by the fiery sands.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Hay', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Clary Sage', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Honey', 'Iris / Orris', 'Leather', 'Sandalwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Juniper Berries', 'Rose (Morocco)']

name: mismar
detail: Looking upwards  in a black canvas sprinkled with diamond dust that shines across light-years  the stars sparkle. An enveloping and comforting scent transports us to celestial eternity.

name: titanium-male
detail: Ajmal is designed for those who believe that life is a constant journey in which there is always room for new discoveries and adventures.

name: essenza-di-unisola-altrove-1
detail: Altrove  The Essential  beyond appearances. With its charm  its mystery  and its remoteness. Here  in Altrove  the strength of a man is born. Out of time and beyond fashion  on a journey to rediscover the nature of the self.

name: sublime
detail: Sublime is a perfume closest to the purest spirits and clean hearts.

name: black-juniper
detail: The dry juniper note joins the black pepper creating a purely Mediterranean chord  in a warm and interesting perfume.

name: 24-old-bond-street-2
detail: Inspired by the very first Atkinsons fragrance created over 200 years ago  24 Old Bond Street cologne is a gloriously warm and spicy concoction of juniper  rose and Earl Grey tea. Below these wonderfully traditional British scents is a subtle hint of smoky cask-aged whisky  creating the warm but surprisingly fresh fragrance that has long been considered an enduring icon.

name: trussardi-ruby-red
detail: Ruby Red is the fragrance of new passions.

name: ferre-blooming-rose
detail: A fragrance that heals the heart. The rose is the queen of flowers. It has a very special botanical structure with five petals arranged around the corolla that can be repeated endlessly. Not by chance  it symbolizes sacred and profane love - absolute completeness.

name: bella-blanca
detail: "A garden is probably the purest and spiritual of joys a communion with nature and beauty in their most simple and fundamental forms " Oscar de la Renta.
ingredients: ['Freesia', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Sandalwood', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Rose', 'Tuberose', 'Dew Drop', 'Pear', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Green Leaves', 'Musk', 'Peach', 'Violet Leaves', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)']

name: puredkny-a-drop-of-vanilla
detail: “PureDKNY speaks to the core essence of who I am and what I want to touch  the people and children I love  and being at one with nature. It's about those little moments that bring you joy  pure and simple ” Donna Karan.

name: kenzo-memori-reve-lotus
detail: Memories of joyful walks  clouds reflected in the pond. Rêve Lotus is an ode to reverie and contemplation.

name: mimosa-pour-moi-1
detail: Mimosa pour Moi is like holding a large bunch of fragrant mimosa flowers in both hands and pressing one's face gently into it. An Impressionist's painting of early spring.

name: mixed-emotions
detail: Mixed Emotions  is an epicene scent designed to reflect the tumultuous nature of our times. Drawing on the Byredo philosophy of translating fragmented memories and abstract ideas into scent  Mixed Emotions presents an olfactive sketch of our current  collective state of mind.

name: mandarine-mate-vert
detail: Inspired by a barefoot morning stroll through the glistening grass and the scorching mate that Carlotha Ray's designer Mariela has for breakfast in her garden  this scent is a perfect fusion of her home brew and the fresh morning dew.

name: police-to-be-freetolove-for-man-2023
detail: This inclusive scent was developed for those who want to be free to express themselves and their creativity  and celebrate love.

name: gucci-guilty-parfum-pour-homme
detail: For those looking for a declaration of love free from the rules and definitions of society  Gucci Guilty Intense and Gucci Guilty Parfum pour Homme are designed to act as emblems of the connection between like-minded  eccentric lovers.

name: starwalker-extreme-1
detail: A bold  adventurous and extreme fragrance for the man who wants to explore.

name: moncler-sunrise-pour-femme
detail: Moncler Sunrise pour Femme is a tribute to the majesty of nature  to exploration and to heightened senses  capturing the simple yet thrilling emotion of the breaking dawn in the heart of the mountain range.

name: loubiluna-1
detail: Loubiluna incarnates an elegant royal falcon standing on an impressive crescent moon. The back of this imperial falcon features the iconic red sole and is crowned with the house's monogram.

name: desertland-1
detail: The essence of a blooming green desert shimmers in the warm air. Bright  crisp notes wrap themselves around sun-kissed woods  capturing both the sandy warmth of the day and the cool immensity of the still night.

name: vetyver
detail: A fresh  elegant scent with a warm trail.

name: fighter
detail: Fighter is a unique scent intended for men who aren't afraid to demand  yet at the same time have endurance  courage  responsibility and protective tendencies.

name: cool-spark
detail: Take a deep dive into the magical scent of Cool Spark for long-lasting freshness.

name: lolita-lempicka-le-parfum-2023
detail: An enchanting nectar oscillating between sweetness and freshness  Le Parfum is one of those fragrances whose breeze is instantly recognisable. For this limited edition  the bottle takes on a midnight blue hue  decorated with a gold thread sparkling with a shower of stars. Through magic  Lolita Lempicka transports us into her enchanting universe.

name: hypnotic-poison-eau-de-toilette-roller-pearl-1
detail: An oriental  beguiling and terribly sensual perfume with a special bottle  the roller-pearl.

name: boss-bottled-elixir
detail: With elegant refinement  Boss Bottled Elixir encourages you to find your inner light and be your own BOSS.

name: comme-une-evidence-ltd-ed-2019
detail: "I imagined a perfume bathed in light  like an infinite sensation of space: a chypre accord that is resolutely modernised  chic and timeless"  Annick Menardo  Perfumer.

name: dom-rosa-millesime-2023
detail: Dom Rosa celebrates its 10th anniversary! For the occasion  our iconic fragrance reveals a unique envelope: a special edition in a millésimé version.

name: for-her-musc-noir
detail: Narciso Rodriguez for Her Musc Noir is a tribute to the powerful mystique of a woman's inner beauty and innate sensuality. "It has a mysterious  dark and seductive quality that is rare and unique " Narciso Rodriguez.

name: narciso-rodriguez-for-her-musc-nude
detail: Created to complement and celebrate the wearer’s own skin  Musc Nude embraces the body  like a second skin. A radiant  delicate  softly sensual interpretation of the timeless chypre structure.

name: parfum-captive-2
detail: J.F. Schwarzlose Berlin tells the stories behind the obvious. The creation of perfumes is an art that has a story to tell; an individual story for each person who wears our Parfum Captives  which will enchant the wearer along with his or her surroundings.

name: elixir-de-bombe
detail: Boom  there it is  the very moment when you just go for what you want without hesitating.

name: av-midnight-blossom-1
detail: A fragrance inspired by the mysterious transformation of midnight  AV Midnight Blossom opens with seductive notes  leading to a romantic and velvety d heart  while the enveloping and addictive signature creates an irresistible nuance that is long-lasting and memorable.

name: white-musk-lover
detail: Create your own signature fragrance by layering White Musk Lover with the original White Musk fragrance and experience our iconic scent in your own unique way.

name: relover-1
detail: Live your life without limits. Be fashionable. Be emotional. Face your challenges like a man! Yet never forget to remain true to yourself.

name: aesthetic-turbulence
detail: Aesthetic Turbulence is what allows us to transform reality into beauty. Aesthetic conflict is the source of art. This kind of turbulence does not admit "false notes". It draws the consciousness towards aesthetic harmony in all fields: art  perfume  charm  design  cuisine  literature and love.

name: foglie-di-te-tea-leaves
detail: A glorious perfume that can warm the heart and refresh the thoughts  just like a tasty cup of tea.

name: eau-de-figuier
detail: A relaxing  comforting Mediterranean perfume  where the freshness of the fig tree blends with more fruity  flowery notes.

name: figment-woman-1
detail: "Figment Woman is an expression of the Bhutan of my imagination. Neither fantasy nor reality  it is an olfactory hologram  composed of the fragments that make up the intense beauty of my life." Christopher Chong  Creative Director.

name: shell-beach
detail: This perfume triggers memories of seaside summers with its iodine and solar notes.

name: spicy-charm-1
detail: Sensual  fruity and mysterious: Spicy Charm from the Douglas Privée Collection is a fragrance for all women who want to captivate and fascinate.

name: visionary-eye
detail: Berlin was Bowie’s mirror  a cultural mix where the past met the present to rewrite the future. Unconventional  avant-garde  experimental  full of energy and acceptance  incredibly modern and historical  the balance between opposites. The fragrance embodies this spirit  an unconventional Iris  extremely modern and very alive to mirror Berlin and Bowie’s dualism.

name: artaban-1
detail: Originally created for the Parthian kings  Artaban was the idol of the wealthy Romans. Reinterpreted by perfumer Dominique Ropion  Artaban is a wild  telluric fragrance that celebrates the wonders of plants.

name: fuoco-infernale
detail: An equally varied and captivating composition of spicy and herbaceous aspects of natural myrtle  warm spices and sweet resins. The rich  opulent character of the heart notes blends seamlessly with the distinctive elements of the leathery base.

name: equipage
detail: Inspired by the world of the horse  the name Équipage designates everything you need to travel in comfort and elegance. It evokes the refined spirit of sharing and teamwork. An aromatic writing  a chic and refined style. A classic novel  an adventure story.
ingredients: ['Tarragon', 'Clary Sage', 'Fresh Spices', 'Marjoram', 'Oakmoss', 'Carnation', 'Cinnamon', 'Hyssop', 'Pine Needles', 'Amber', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Liatris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vetiver']

name: kenzoki-fizz-de-gingembre-euphorisant
detail: A more fragrant formula and enhanced plant extract transforms Kenzo's Beneficial Waters collection into Perfumed Beneficial Waters: Fizz. The scent is captured in this moisturizing mist. Its main ingredient  plant water  is rich in nutritive elements that are readily absorbed by the skin.

name: police-independent-1
detail: Independent opens with a zesty-spicy accord on the top  the fragrance turns deeply woody within heart notes. Sandalwood  white woods  patchouli  and vetiver give vigour and strength to the fragrance and they are emphasized by a solemn incense. In the base  ambery accents and musky tones exalt the emotions of the perfume.

name: 1902-the-blanc-1
detail: Discreet  luminous  white tea combines with fresh and green notes  while the heart adds richness with floral nuances punctuated with citrus hues. A fusion of musks and woody notes adds a touch of sparkle and light a light airy finish.

name: little-woman-urban-jungle-1
detail: Check out Ikks Little Woman Urban Jungle. A bubbly botanical perfume for you adventurers who dream of exploring and escaping it all.

name: police-icon-platinum-1
detail: Police Icon Platinum is perfect for men with strong personalities who are looking for an energetic and powerful fragrance. It is a scent that defines pure masculinity with a touch of freshness.

name: signature-lovers-woman-1
detail: Replay Signature Lovers Woman is an elegant fragrance that expresses grace and passion with superb and unique floral emotions.

name: tank-plate-for-her
detail: This inebriating fragrance unites female seduction and colorful happiness to create a narcotic and luxuriously tempting fragrance.

name: n-17-flor-sensual
detail: Bright citrus fruits wrapped in the velvety sweetness of red berries melt into a luminous  addictive blend full of femininity.

name: blackcurrant-praline
detail: This scent evokes a crystal-clear waterfall in Lebano with birds flying around  surrounded by the sacred scent of cedar trees. Unearthly beautiful.

name: mandarin-praline-white-flowers-1
detail: An sweet scent for the elegant woman.

name: imperial-peacock-extrait-de-parfum
detail: This gourmand extrait features a more caramelised vanilla than ever and keeps a deep intimacy with its musky base notes.

name: vanilla
detail: For true lovers of vanilla fragrances. An enveloping and enveloping gourmand journey that elevates the beauty of this fragrance to the power of two.

name: mystic-haze
detail: Mystic Haze takes us on a journey into the unknown  through the early morning mist on the banks of the Nile sailing past mystic memorials of the old pharaohs.

name: lolita-lempicka-eau-de-parfum-original-1
detail: Lolita Lempicka Eau de Parfum Original refers to the greatest secret  to the moment when a girl becomes a woman and the transition between desire  excitement and a taste for temptation that attracts new desires. A more emancipated femininity  nourished by modern ideas  less innocent  freer but as romantic as ever.

name: unica-coral-1
detail: Única Coral is a fragrance inspired by authentic women who embrace their imperfections.

name: cocoa-praline
detail: This scent is a praline coated with a cocoa blossom  a soft and warm pleasure.

name: maltol-cinnamon
detail: A contemporary  spicy fragrance with a gourmand touch.

name: blackberry-bay-1
detail: Childhood memories of blackberry picking stained lips  sticky palms. A burst of deep  tart blackberry juice  blending with the freshness of just-gathered bay and brambly woods. Vibrant and verdant.

name: p-undefeated
detail: A refreshing scent for the sporty gentleman.

name: uplift
detail: A scent that smells like victory  vibrance  luxury.

name: seduction-pour-homme
detail: A new day brings new opportunities to face more challenges. Armaf Seduction Man Eau de Parfum for men will refresh your mind so you can boldly follow your instinct. Dare your everyday adventures.

name: evje
detail: Evje fragrance is a tribute to the unforgettable stories of summer in this idyllic Norwegian place.

name: bulletproof
detail: Bulletproof by Revolution Man is a clean and fresh fragrance inspired by heroism.

name: blackberry-bay-2021-1
detail: Childhood memories of blackberry picking stained lips  sticky palms. A burst of deep  tart blackberry juice  blending with the freshness of just-gathered bay and brambly woods. Vibrant and verdant.

name: fame-blooming-pink-2023
detail: With Fame  Paco Rabanne offers a bold new vision of femininity. Brimming with precious ingredients  the super-innovative composition is the quintessence of avant-garde luxury. An irresistible scent that radiates joy and bold sensuality in the bright pink Fame collector's edition bottle. The perfect gift for the star of your life  as cheerful as a bouquet of flowers. Time to bloom. Time to shine.

name: cuba-heartbreaker
detail: Cuba Heartbreaker is a radiant feminine scent with an exciting arrangement of notes making it perfect for casual dates out with friends or time spent at the office.

name: fruit-defendu
detail: A gourmand  flamboyant fragrance with a colourful  tempting scent. An aphrodisiac promise of eternal desire.

name: mango-manga
detail: Savour the flavour of an exotic mango  juicy freshness enhancing the vibrant and sweetness in this scent.

name: cedre-neroli-lumineux-1
detail: This luminous fragrance associates the elegance of the Cedar tree with the freshness of Neroli  vivifying for all our senses in true harmony.

name: neroli
detail: A refreshing and sweet scent with a lush  earthy trail.

name: neroli-petit-grain-printanier
detail: Neroli and Petitgrain is an intensely spicy fragrance that opens with sharp  sweet citrus notes  while the heart softens  culminating in a dazzling full-bodied fragrance that is both fresh and bitter  creating a beautifully enhanced exotic scent that blends perfectly with a warm summer's day.

name: tubereuse-neroli
detail: Tubéreuse & Néroli pays homage to natural beauty  femininity and elegance. It perfectly accentuates your natural charm and relaxed sophistication.

name: blue-sky-neroli
detail: Optimistic. Like a cloudless day. Evoke the after the rain smell of nature. Blue Sky Neroli has the ability to transport you back to a special time  and smelling it after that time  might recall those memories and wonderful moments.

name: tacit-1
detail: Tacit refers to knowledge that is implicitly understood rather than directly communicated  and alludes to the elusive  almost indefinable quality that is more easily experienced than articulated. Notable for its innovative construction  the formula blends refined ingredients from around the world.

name: dkny-women-fall-2019
detail: DKNY Fall is a bright  glowing  and energetic scent.

name: shawn-mendes-signature-ii
detail: Shawn Mendes Signature II is a unique woody addiction suitable for men and women.

name: norell-new-york-1
detail: Normal Norell and his renowned aesthetic translated the mystique of the French Couture to the showrooms of Seventh Avenue - revolutionizing American ready-to-wear with an elegant  feminine look that is still emulated today. With Norell New York  we celebrate the next generation of American style-setters with the re-invention of a timeless classic that is rooted in luxury with a perfume of understated glamour  sophistication  and sensuality.

name: norell-elixir
detail: The Norell Elixir woman captivates and beguiles. She is mysterious and passionate  sultry and magnetic - a woman who commands the room as soon as she enters it.

name: essencial-feminino-2013-1
detail: Essencial Feminino is a refined and authentic perfume for the elegant woman.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Egypt)', 'Ginger', 'Carnation', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Freesia', 'Hyacinth', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Tuberose', 'Violet', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Apple', 'Citruses', 'Green Notes', 'Mandarin', 'Peach', 'Amber', 'Caramel', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Sandalwood']

name: s-sugar-by-shakira-2020
detail: Diamonds? No thanks. Today's girls know how to have fun  their own way. Had a bad day? All you need to do is send a message to your group of friends to have a fun girls' night out and if it's accompanied by the most delicious sweets  even better! S Sugar is an optimistic fragrance  for fun-loving girls ready to celebrate at any moment with sugar!

name: cherry-blossom-2
detail: This scent was inspired by the cherry blossom (sakura)  Japan's unofficial national flower. It has been celebrated for many centuries and takes a very prominent position in Japanese culture. This composition is a soft  sheer floral with a hint of cherry.

name: rainbow-gems
detail: All the colours of the light spectrum crystallised in these precious stones that exchange their energy with an explosive perfume with fruity  floral  and woody notes. Just imagine what might happen.

name: inara-white
detail: Express your sweet side through this delicious fragrance.

name: ekhtiari
detail: Ekhtiariuna versatile powdery-floral composition.

name: nafaeis-al-shaghaf-pour-homme
detail: An irresistible scent with juicy  succulent fruity notes  exotic floral accords and a musky woody trail.

name: prima-donna
detail: A sensual fragrance that flirts with emotions and awakens the imagination.
ingredients: ['Fruity Notes', 'Leather', 'Amber', 'Cherry', 'Jasmine', 'Rose', 'Lactonic Accord (fruity milky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Green Notes', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Resins', 'Chocolate']

name: woodstock-1
detail: Woodstock is inspired by the music festival and iconic gathering of hippie culture.

name: wabar-2019-1
detail: An instant winner  Wabar presents with dynamic juicy fruit notes against a lush  romantic floral bouquet dusted with just the right amount of gingery spice

name: pacific-rock-moss-1
detail: Citrus infused  tangy and dazzlingly fresh  Pacific Rockmoss is the quintessential texture and embodiment of coastal New South Wales. Blue water and white sea spray on coastal rockmoss  it is at once fresh  striking and bold.

name: creamy-sunshine-1
detail: Irresistible and delightfully unique  discover the most feminine and playful fragrance of all!

name: tiare
detail: Tiare is a flower that does not easily give up its secrets. It took many trails and different incarnations to find the subtle progression from citrus to flower that we wanted.

name: coco-paradise
detail: Coco Paradise is like stepping into an oasis of warm  sweet and relaxing luxury.

name: vanille-1
detail: An Eau de Toilette with an exotic bewitchment that interprets the essential vanilla with intensity. A fragrance of escape  to wear all year round!

name: sun-eau-delicieuse-parfumante
detail: Sun Eau Délicieuse Parfumante will accompany you everywhere this summer. At the beach and into the evening the sun will still be on your skin! For those who want to start summer early or extend it!

name: tiare-1
detail: The exotic Tiaré flower  a sweet scent with heavenly accents. Worn alone  Tiaré is an invitation to sail in the most beautiful islands of the Pacific. A heavenly truce where the tiaré flower gradually leaves room for intoxicating notes.

name: aloha-tiare-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Sensuality and exoticism of tropical vegetation with frangipani leaf at the top caressed by the warm note of tiare flower and ylang on a languid bed of monoi  coconut  vanilla and musk.

name: intimate-white-flowers
