Moss  both natural and high-tech  emerges from the green depths  clinging to the walls of the city as it does to the trees  suffused with an assertive natural character that brings richness and comfort to the initial accord. The fragrance’s trail becomes more intense on the skin.

name: h24
detail: "To create this Hermès signature fragrance  I had to open up other less predictable paths  to move away from the conventional woodiness of men's scents. I was thinking of urban nature  the accelerated image of this fragile little shoot pushing through concrete to claim its space. I find this expression of this movement  this life force  enormously moving " Christine Nagel  Perfumer.

name: santal-blanc-2
detail: White is purity. White is softness. White is synonymous with perfect balance. This textured fragrance is intended to evoke a "white matter"  seducing the most delicate and cottony facets of sandalwood.

name: nicks-sunflower
detail: A bright  sunny and dazzling scent that evokes what a sunflower would smell like if it had a scent. Nick's Sunflower  is an interpretation of the Sunflower’s scent bringing summer's bright and warm perspectives.

name: ultrahot-1
detail: "And if the light radiated an odor? When the sky embraces the earth  the sun erases the shadows. Nature becomes pure vibration  "Aurélien Guichard  Perfumer.

name: pear-inc
detail: Pear Inc. is a «serious» fragrance name that hides its true nature: an improvised lunch underneath the pergola  the sound of laughter  a water bomb playfully exploding  a finger dipping into a jar of jam. Pear Inc. is that mischievous perfume that instantly makes you smile.

name: blushing-sands
detail: A scent as dreamy as the night and as delicate as the dawn. A lush oasis of subtle depths  sensuality  and light.

name: own-your-zone-unleash-unlsh
detail: Built through science for a sports state of mind for life  Unleash / Unlsh has been designed for women who train  for a mind state of strength with boundless potential.

name: ever-bloom-ginza-flower
detail: Modern  vibrant  exuberant  visionary...Tokyo's electrifying Ginza district is the heartbeat of the city. It is precisely what inspired Ever Bloom Ginza Flower  the evocation of an avant-garde and innovative Japan that's far removed from clichés - the perfect embodiment of modern femininity.

name: mia-sensual-night
detail: Light up the night with this bright  sensual scent!
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Orange Blossom', 'Apple', 'Apricot', 'Peach', 'Pear', 'Raspberry', 'Resins', 'Vanilla', 'Balsamic Notes', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Nutmeg', 'Pink Pepper', 'Saffron', 'Tangerine', 'Caramel', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood', 'Freesia', 'Gardenia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Peony', 'Praline', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood', 'Tuberose', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Muscenone (Musk)']

name: governors-island-1
detail: Imagine! You in flapper attire  sipping cocktails as you view a panoramic sunset over Manhattan. That's no fantasy. That's 21st century Governors Island  New York's prime venue for summer galas. And since summer 2018  it's got a gala-ready Bond No.9 namesake eau de parfum it can call its own.

name: vida-loca-for-him
detail: Duck Vida Loca is the ideal scent for men who enjoy life but never forget about the planet.

name: be-happy-feel-good
detail: Give your day a boost of happiness with this effervescent and sparkling fragrance  powerfully scented with beautiful and uplifting notes. A modern fragrance carefully developed to leave you beaming with joy.

name: spritzlove
detail: In memory of a friendship ritual  a rich  smoky wood splashed with a shot of Spritz.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Papyrus', 'Aperol Spritz', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Vetiver', 'Vertofix Coeur (Cedarwood Note)', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Saffron', 'Amber', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Patchouli', 'Rose', 'Linalool (Floral Note)']

name: the-paintings-of-palazzo-reale
detail: "This aristocratic fragrance is built around the richest and most sumptuous raw materials. To embody the lavish splendor of Palazzo Reale  I decided to use spices and scents that recall precious materials of the time like woods  balsams  and resins. To enhance the modernity and smoothness of the fragrance  I added an addictive  deep  and sophisticated almond milk accord " Pierre-Costantin Guéros  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Almond Milk', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)', 'Cardamom', 'Honey', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Vanilla (Bourbon)', 'Dates', 'Patchouli', 'Plum']

name: sun-parfum
detail: Surrender to our addictive signature Jil Sander Sun Parfum. Made with ten natural ingredients  this fragrance exudes a seductive warmth. Let yourself be enchanted.

name: ambre-cello-gold-edition
detail: This mystical scent evokes the story of a nomad  a genius virtuoso. Divine cello notes. Unspeakable magic. Lyrical and silky amber scents floating in the desert.

name: cr7-origins
detail: Authentic and genuine  Origins is a light  subtle fragrance for those of you who are passionate about life  nature  and finding joy in simplicity.

name: karl-rome-divino-amore
detail: Karl Lagerfeld  who lived in the city of Rome for part of the year for almost half a century  was amazed by its architecture and mythology. Divino Amore was the name of the street where he had his flat  an address that suited him perfectly. This fragrance is a tribute to a city steeped in divine love.

name: walking-on-via-fiori-oscuri
detail: "Mimosa is a timeless perfume note that is constantly being reinvented. I created this perfume to pay homage to this unique flower by playing on this duality. Fresh yet warm and enveloping " Pierre Constantin-Guéros  Perfumer.

name: united-dreams-green-cactus-for-him-2023
detail: Green cactus has come to inspire us  to show us that being sustainable is an attitude to life rather than a fashion statement. With this unique fragrance  United Colors of Benetton proves once again that sustainability is part of its DNA  and that green is more than a colour  it is a philosophy. Green Cactus for Him is inspired by the restorative properties of the cactus. The green cactus has a fresh  green scent with a fun and cheerful touch  full of energy. The smoky note of mezcal adds a touch of originality. A luminous green freshness reinforced by aloe vera and sage. Strength and character accentuated by woody base notes. A complete green experience.

name: kaiak-vital-masculino
detail: The fragrance Kaiak Vital  as well as a reenergizing encounter with the sea  makes you feel full of life.

name: nektar
detail: "When I received the first samples of the fragrance that later became Nektar  I was immediately captivated by the creativity  the softness  the charisma  the quality of the composition. A fragrance that revolves around an evocation of honey without being cloying  but with intense notes that give it character and do not go unnoticed"  Roberto Drago  Olfactory Director.

name: rose-damour
detail: Generous and happy  she is a lover  a wife  a mother simply a woman. She radiates and enjoys her life. Her universe: the family home and all places she accepts as her own by her presence.

name: rosa-flamenca
detail: Sensual and provocative  she is the Andalusian beauty. Her world is captivating and wild to the rhythm of flamenco.

name: soliflore
detail: Soli.flore. is your go-to perfume whenever you want to stand out from the crowd. A flourishing sense of uniqueness.

name: exploud-1
detail: ExpLOud is an aromatic explosion based on the most precious and luminous of ouds  with floral notes that lift and twist the characteristic scent of this unique raw material.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)', 'Coriander', 'Nutmeg', 'Red Berries', 'Black Pepper', 'Gardenia', 'Magnolia', 'Patchouli']

name: synergy
detail: A harmonious combination of your senses. A blend that recreated your passion.

name: police-potion-arsenic
detail: This fragrance is sensual with luxurious notes and is ideal for women who want to seduce and bewitch the people around them.

name: lisola-che-non-ce-1
detail: Sparkling  cheerful  airy. This scent is an olfactory journey beyond the simple evocation of freshness.
ingredients: ['Elemi', 'Cedarwood', 'Black Pepper', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Cinnamon', 'Coriander', 'Ginger', 'Lemon', 'Nutmeg', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)']

name: il-sole-dentro-1
detail: Bright  seductive  sunny. Il Sole Dentro evokes the scent of Mediterranean flora illuminated by the golden rays of sun.
ingredients: ['Orange', 'Sandalwood', 'Solar Notes', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Cedarwood', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Vetiver (Java)', 'Ambrostar (Woody Ambery)', 'Cardamom', 'Coffee', 'Geranium', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Tonkalactone']

name: axe-provocation
detail: Welcome to the future  and it smells amazing! Stay fresh and smell irresistible all day long with Axe Provocation eau de toilette for men.

name: une-verveine-1
detail: Une Verveine is as comforting as grog  a bit crazy as well  which is what Obvious likes about it. A fluro green verbena with beautifully simple nature.

name: sparkling-love
detail: Sparkling Love is a luminous  powerful floral  as pure and captivating as a diamond.

name: santal-melody
detail: A healing woody fragrance  inspired by Suzhou  China  elegant and pure. The milky woody taste is like a gentle mist  soothing the restlessness and anxiety in the heart.

name: twilight-shimmer-2018-1
detail: Michael Kors Twilight Shimmer is both bold and opulent. Filled with the energy and excitement of a glamorous night out on the town  it captures your most sensuous moments in an intoxicating scent.

name: al-thara-oud
detail: A fruity aroma in the top notes permeates through the air  then deepens and softens with the emergence of floral and leathery notes for a precious scent. The addition of precious oud further intensifies the rich fruity notes.

name: al-thara
detail: A fruity aroma in the top notes permeates through the air  then deepens and softens with the emergence of floral and leathery notes for a precious scent.

name: 100-eau-de-parfum
detail: Inspired by the empowering numerology of 100  this wonderful perfume stands for having the self-confidence to trust your instincts and follow your dreams; a belief from the heart of Trish McEvoy.

name: ambre-magique-1
detail: Ambre Magique is a tribute to ambergris. This extraordinary material has fascinated people since the beginning of time. So fascinating that its origin has long been a subject of debate. A realm of legends  wonders and fantastic powers  which inspired Alberto Morillas for Ambre Magique. Amber as we have never smelled it before  luminous  sensual and with a vibrant  woody intensity.

name: tonic-water
detail: Tonic Water is a tribute to the ocean and the sensations we feel in the face of it: to the intense  invigorating freshness it so instantly imparts.

name: sky-di-gioia-1
detail: Sky di Gioia was inspired by the infinite space of dreams and the dawning of a new day. The scent is an expression of joy.

name: histoire-dorangers-1
detail: An ingrained memory of the sunset atop the earth walls of Taroudant; the warm light intensifies the colours of the raw land and the air freshens. An Eau imbued with light  delicate and pure.

name: ever-bloom-eau-de-toilette
detail: You are unique. Radiant and graceful. When you enter a room  you don't need to be noticed. You will be remembered.

name: polo-blue-sport
detail: Celebrating the time-honored thrill of competition and sportsmanship  Ralph Lauren's Polo Blue Sport is a fragrance for the modern active sportsman. Embodying a style that pairs tradition and heritage icons with a bold contemporary spirit.

name: globulus
detail: A breeze of lively and minty freshness.

name: nordic-waters-for-him
detail: The relationship with water in the Nordics runs deep. Everchanging  yet always there  this vibrant watery scent will entice you into this mesmerising aquatic world with each refreshing spritz.

name: roma-uomo-cedro-1
detail: Roma Uomo Cedro is for men who know how to harmonise extremes.

name: maxime-icon
detail: A powerful unity of modern fragrance development and ancient treasures  Icon is crafted with an intense vibration of ingredients. The scent’s structure is faceted with freshness and rich woods that leave an enduring mark.

name: mercedes-benz
detail: The Mercedes-Benz man. An independent spirit. Comfortable with his success  he doesn't follow trends. He aspires to be the best. Confident and true to himself  he has nothing to prove and everything to live for. His perfume? Mercedes-Benz for Men. A modern  masculine fragrance born from the fusion of elegance and technology  from the attraction of power and the art of seduction.

name: cerruti-1881-acqua-forte
detail: "The initial idea revolved around daring to use a simple  minimalist formula to get a better association with this distinctive Mediterranean freshness. To do that  we had to choose authentic  powerful and very high-quality elements " Oliver Cresp  Perfumer.

name: ambre-sultan
detail: Sumptuous  comfortable  singular. A perfume outside of time  it explores a different road and fresh ideas in the domain of perfumery. Ambre Sultan is a masculine perfume but not for men. It is a perfume for grand dukes  kings  sultans. Ambre Sultan is blue blood. "I have learnt about perfume in Morocco  where I lived a good part of the year. Many years ago I found a piece of amber. Its perfume  invading sensual  profound  seduced me utterly " Serge Lutens.

name: this-is-love-him-1
detail: This Is Love Him! is a story of love at first sight. A couple of lovers who adore one another and find themselves in "a Paris" that they know by heart. They are artists of the present. A love story that sounds like a challenge. A touch  then a kiss. Freedom is shared; heat and sin is a blank canvas on which they draw with the tips of their fingers. This is the fragrance of burning love  inedible and undisciplined.

name: nvrmind
detail: "Æther and indie art fanzine NVRMIND share the same values of aesthetics  art  disruption  anti-conformity  sensuality  and beauty quest. This collaboration between us was evidence ” Nicolas Chabot   Founder of Æther.

name: dangerous-me
detail: "I insisted that we keep it really free and strong in the combination of ingredients. I love that it's a really radical proposition. Dangerous Me has vanilla  ginger  gray amber and cedar notes  “ Julien Dossena.

name: squid-1
detail: The vast ocean swells and contracts  caught in the relentless pull of the moon. Beneath the surface  a shoal of squid emerges. Strange  elastic shapes rise from the depths in a frantic search for sustenance. They are not alone. Their predators lunge  but the blinding jets of murky ink thwart them.

name: opus-xii-rose-incense-1
detail: Inspired by the mystery of Orson Welles' Rosebud  Opus XII is an amber  pointillist constellation of flashing moments that come and go from the dregs of memory  forcing us to believe that  despite our knowledge of the present  only childhood memories are real.

name: polo-supreme-leather-1
detail: “There is an intrinsic quality to leather that conjures up a world of fine craftsmanship and iconic style. These are the same characteristics that have been crafted into the new Polo Supreme Leather fragrance.” - Ralph Lauren

name: altered-leather-1
detail: The mysterious breath of soft  fresh leather notes  like an undiscovered olfactory secret.

name: leather-black-knight
detail: "This fragrance offers a world without boundaries. A hint of bergamot ignites a taste for adventure  jasmine and leather are the enduring companions of the endless quest. You have to go on an adventure to find your true place"  Serge de Oliveira  Perfumer.

name: purple-heart-v5-1
detail: An act of courage. Courageous instinct. It is the scent of selfless courage that triumphs. Inspired by the Purple Heart medal  which is awarded for an act of bravery in war  our Purple Heart v.5 pays homage to the selfless courage in all of us.

name: lair-barbes-1
detail: L'air Barbès  which illustrates the monochrome simplicity and androgynous character of the painting  is also a tribute to his Parisian surroundings.

name: coeur-de-noir-1
detail: A dark heart beats softly in dusty dark rooms. Its pulse increases  ink creeps; tributaries drawn across the page. Forgotten tongues whisper "keep pushing  keep looking. It's closer than you think.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Bergamot', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Suede', 'Birch Tar', 'Dry Woods', 'Paper', 'Cedarwood', 'Lavender', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Ginger', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Ink', 'Lemon', 'Rum', 'Vanilla', 'Black Pepper']

name: comme-des-garcons-2-2
detail: Comme des Garçons 2 plays with complements and contrasts. With reflection and opacity. With mirrors and brilliance. With light and shadow. With earth and the energy of the sun.

name: noiressence
detail: "I imagined a perfume without anything binding it  without background noise  whose facets successions of abstract and contrasted impacts express the infinite brightness of black  an absolute black full of light  like a painting by Pierre Soulages ” Alexandra Carlin  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Orange Blossom', 'Cade', 'Styrax', 'Bitter Orange', 'Black Pepper', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Ink', 'Iris / Orris', 'Seaweed / Algae']

name: burqa
detail: Mystical and fluid  with tones of Chinese ink and bewitching essences of hard wood  this anthracite fragrance is liquid incense with notable prestige and elegance.

name: secret-potion-n-2-1
detail: Bullfrog presents an exclusive collaboration with the Spanish artist Ramon Maiden  where art and lifestyles meet  the result of mutual admiration and passion.

name: anarchist-a
detail: A scent that expresses the frustration of our times.

name: mortal-skin
detail: Charming  elegant  and mysterious  the snake so majestically represented on the bottle  slowly approaches its victim and hypnotizes with its diamond eyes and breathtaking charisma. Its desire is vibrant  the danger is approaching and the seduction is taking place.

name: guethary
detail: Guéthary is the name of the charming  romantic French village that inspired this fragrance. A place of relaxation  savoir-vivre and exclusivity. A place infused with salty and floral aromas and long since a place of rest for the Parisian elite.

name: birch-black-pepper
detail: Britain today. Its rebellious punk roots  but with an enduring respect for tradition.

name: notturno
detail: Notturno was born during the night  the time of poetry  the time of inner research. It is contained in five autobiographical poetic moments  the olfactory pyramid of Notturno lives in harmony with ink and rum  long ripened fruit  like memories. The wet wood in the forest; the poet walking bare feet  always looking for something. The main theme of this new work by Meo Fusciuni is poetry.

name: le-messager
detail: An olfactory interpretation evoking the blue of the ink deposited on the correspondence between two lovers.

name: c4ss1e-x-amb3rnyl-1
detail: Cassie flowers are so naïve and innocent to survive the dangers of the deep forest. The smell of cassie flowers has always been warm  balsamic  joyful. Until it was poisoned by an invasion of coniferous trees and amber fossils.

name: carboneum
detail: Carboneum. The dreams of a child: the man in a diving suit who resurfaces from the ocean drained by the waves  before being propelled into space by a magnetic force. A strange harmony represented by neoprene. You can also smell the texture of the foam  a little rough. The next night he had the same dream.

name: polo-black
detail: The Polo Black guy is sexy  confident and modern. He possesses a different kind of sophistication  a downtown attitude and a touch of urban  daring  mysterious  slightly dangerous...
ingredients: ['Mango', 'Artemisia', 'Patchouli', 'Clary Sage', 'Sandalwood', 'Green Watery Accord', 'Timberol (Cedarwood note)', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Tonka Bean']

name: sweet-amber
detail: "In Sweet Amber  I envisioned a new approach to gourmand notes. Drawn from orange blossom  a symbol of pure femininity  I made it as light and airy  yet as addictive as possible. I see the woman who wears this  as very sensitive  yet powerful and free " Philippe Romano  Perfumer.

name: superfusion-1
detail: "Fall in love with a scent of skin  a heat that is intensely cold " Céline Ellena  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Heliotrope', 'Musk', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Black Pepper', 'Galaxolide (Musk)', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Everlasting Flower']

name: 102-the-cardamome-mimosa-1
detail: A sunny brunch degustating macarons.

name: saskia-1
detail: To commemorate the 25th anniversary of Saskia Havekes' Grandiflora floral atelier  Saskia's perfume will reflect the interpretive essence of the boutique itself  reflecting what it has been like for her  working her 25 years of floral magic surrounded by both the enduring and ever-changing redolence of nature's most remarkable perfumes.
ingredients: ['Water Hyacinth', 'Boronia', 'Gardenia', 'Floral Notes', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Mimosa (Grasse)', 'Ginger', 'Myrtle', 'Pink Pepper', 'Violet Leaves', 'Oakmoss', 'Rain Notes', 'Everlasting Flower']

name: tubereuse-imperiale-1
detail: She walks nonchalantly at a regular pace  like a queen. Everyone looks at her light turban that opens like a corolla  but she pretends not to notice anything. Each petal of her headdress is like a white wing  and her fragile silhouette sways proudly under the weight of her crown glorified by the sun and envied by the flowers around her.

name: 1831-norma-opera-collection
detail: In the classic tradition of aldehydes  a lyrical and subtle flight that leaves a lavish trail rich in passion and fervor.

name: deconstruction
detail: Perfect symmetry is ugly. Everything should be asymmetrical. You can't feel the hands  the sweat  in perfect things. I always want to destroy symmetry.

name: rima-xi
detail: Mysterious and sensual  with a hidden power of destruction under her radiant innocence  captivating and unforgettable  impossible to conquer. Forever immortalised by the 19th-century Spanish poet  G.A. Bécquer

name: botica-214-dark-mint
detail: Botica 214 Dark Mint brings the richness of natural ingredients to its signature freshness. A modern fragrance that contrasts the tonic notes of mint with the strength and sophistication of woods.

name: menta-y-menta-1
detail: Menta y Menta. Aromatic infusion? Aromatic tea? Aromatic cologne? All three descriptions are suitable.

name: bois-de-cedre-citron-vert
detail: Be swept away by the vibrant freshness of the new NATURE Cedar Wood and Lime : a unique combination of the resolutely masculine scents of cedarwood with the vivifying influences of Lime. Moroccan Mint essential oil enhances the freshness of this unique harmony.

name: play-green-1
detail: Get hit with a burst of fresh green with each spritz of this uplifting  'feel-good' scent.

name: 2-nota-di-viaggio-1
detail: Shukran  the magic is the encounter  the light that welcomes you at the end of the long journey from Turkey to Morocco. Ebrezza  I sail lightly  between colours  perfumes  the sea and the sand  what can I tell about Morocco  what can I bring with me? From the encounter between mint and tobacco  Shukran is born  celebrating the lightness of a people  of a magical place. Happiness and waiting come together  time is taken in great consideration  the time of a cup of mint tea.

name: allegria
detail: Evoking the freshness of nature. The lush feel of leaves and moss  like the endless mossy lands of Kyoto. If  while you slept  the indigenous plants  leaves prickling with fervour  grew to gargantuan size  the Allegria is the conduit that would wake you.

name: youth-dew
detail: Simply the sexiest fragrance ever. Absolutely captivating. In 1953  Estée Lauder introduced Youth-Dew  a scented bath oil that doubled as a perfume  and the world of fragrance was changed forever. Until then  women had depended on men to give them perfume as a gift. But Youth-Dew was created for women to buy - and they did. Even today  its captivating  sexy  spicy flavour keeps this true classic a favourite.

name: rouge-confidence
detail: The fragrance works around a comfortable leather note  without being too animalic. This perfume is a confrontation between the luminosity of citrus and freesia at the top and the rather dark base with a leathery  ambery  woody and lactonic accord. Like a dress of leather and purple velvet.

name: gold-incense
detail: A resounding opulence for a refined  fascinating and mystical fragrance.

name: al-khatt-1
detail: Al Khatt is a mystical and seductive fragrance  crafted to transport the wearer to a far off land.

name: mamluk-1
detail: Mamluk is a journey of profound depth  as deep and resinous notes from the earth create a meditative and spiritual scent. A warm and rich invitation to the senses.

name: fars-1
detail: Fars is a rare study of East meets West.

name: gao-1
detail: A deeply animalic scent based on a masterful blend of spices and precious woods.

name: n-5-eau-de-parfum
detail: Chanel Nº5 personifies the eternal woman  it reflects her charm. Why do women adore it so? Because Marilyn Monroe wore nothing else to bed! Because it is the most cherished of gifts. Because it's a woman's fragrance  the very essence of a woman. Because it is all these things and more.

name: gold-immortals-musc-2022
detail: An Oriental Eden shining for eternity. The Musk brings an elegant tonality to its “floriental” signature as Tonka bean and Amber notes open up. Its sillage becomes deliciously bewitching.

name: brompton-immortals
detail: Created as a tribute to Harrods  Brompton Immortals  the perfumer was inspired by the Egyptian legend of immortality to invent this mystical fragrance.

name: gold-immortals
detail: Gold Immortals adorns the traditions of the Orient with a bold Haute Couture touch.

name: gold-immortals-extrait
detail: Master Perfumer Jordi Fernández  reinvents his iconic creation Gold Immortals through a quintessential essence. The extrait de parfum emphasises all the sensuality of the original scent through a brand new combination of scents.

name: chloe-fleur-de-parfum-1
detail: A subtle combination of elegance and sensuality  Chloé Fleur de Parfum feels like a caress of soft silk on bare skin.

name: ciao-bella-1
detail: She is spontaneous and fun  the most elegant among the casual. With a contagious laugh  she transmits the good vibes that you love to be surrounded by. Her fragrance is just as transparent  surprising and unique as she is.

name: 2030-verbena-crush-1
detail: Imagine 2030  with serenity. A sweet and luminous freshness.

name: chameleon-7
detail: A fascinating and hypnotic perfume with multiple olfactory facets  just like a chameleon.

name: this-is-really-her
detail: A bold  captivating scent that tells the story of soul mates in Paris  embarking on exciting new adventures.

name: green-crush
detail: A powerful whiff of green that leaves you energised and wanting more.

name: this-is-her-undressed
detail: An explosive  sensual and even more luminous version of the original This is Her!

name: dancing-light
detail: Dancing Light appears in a pristine breath of snow-colored flowers. Almost icy. Lively and full of contrasts  Dancing Light is a reflection of the northern lights that inspired it.

name: this-is-her-edition-initiale-2022
detail: Rediscover This is Her! through this limited edition that shines with a thousand lights to celebrate winter.

name: jaguar-for-men-ultimate-power
detail: Reach out. Higher. Better. Show no fear. Take the lead. It’s never too late or too soon to break free. A dynamic Jaguar man  you’re always poised to take a leap forward  setting your own rules  travelling the world and overcoming every limit to achieve your dreams. You want a high-energy fragrance that awakens your senses and reflects your boundless drive. Be Jaguar. Refresh your spirit. Reach for Ultimate Power.

name: straight-to-heaven-white-cristal-oud-musk-2021-1
detail: A rich and sensual essence that expresses a typically Mediterranean sensuality with its intoxicating overdose of precious accords. True to tradition  Straight to Heaven White Cristal Oud & Musk 2021 is an extrapolation towards the power of oud  and the bliss of paradise found.

name: this-is-her-art-4-all-2021
detail: For an explosive city  a dazzling scent. This is Her! is soft but wild. Art is truth.

name: lavanda-mediterranea
detail: An aromatic bouquet to freshen up the day.

name: 106-rose-damascena-rose-davana-vanille
detail: Ludovic  the founder of Bon Parfumeur  is particularly fond of walks in the Parc de Bagatelle in May where the olfactory universe is unique. So naturally he wanted to transcribe this smell in a rose perfume: 106.

name: of-hopscotch
detail: Escape to the freedom of your imagination. Pure and unfiltered. Where colourful play-dough notes are built and torn down in a collision of creativity and impulse. An uninhibited moment of undisturbed flow in the grasp of youth.

name: mon-rouge-bloom-in-love-1
detail: Like a rallying cry  a luminous signature to spread positivity and love around you. The colors pink  orange and neon blue intermingle expressing a new collective motto. Love  Bloom  Shine.

name: ganja
detail: Combining woody and herbaceous scents  Ganja promises us an escape and sensorial stimulation.

name: once-upon-a-garden
detail: Once Upon a Garden transports you to that idyllic summer  full of youthful exuberance and anticipation for the adventures ahead. You are drawn to the warmth of the summer night  with the feel of a cool breeze against your skin. The recollection of the fragrant sweet pea in bloom holds your secret  an innocent first kiss. Is it a memory or a dream?

name: a-kiss-of-bliss
detail:
Beware  you might find happiness quite addictive. And one day  the sun comes out. The birds are singing (they always were). The blues have bid farewell  and doubt has decamped! You too sing from the hilltops  and dance and twirl all night long. Your blessings are abundant  your arms full. There’s nowhere to go now. You’re here. With just a touch of this optimist’s ointment you’ll feel all the hallelujahs. A gateway to gratitude and eternal (floral) bliss. 
Infuse some optimism with rose and jasmine. A spritz of elation. So long  melancholy! Happiness jumps for joy.

name: elegant-rose-1
detail: Take a romantic stroll through the rose garden with Elegant Rose. This beautifully feminine composition will be a great choice for summer days and warm evenings.

name: me-first
detail: Sometimes  you’ve just got to put Me First. Because to quote a wise figure  if you can’t love yourself  how on earth are you going to love somebody else? (Can we get an amen?) Embellished with a Beating Heart  that most symbolic of the Herrera charms  this fragrance is your sign to start looking after number one. So don’t call it narcissism and do call it an ode to self-love  self-acceptance and all those other sentiments that make it fabulous to be you.  A bold feminine scent that exudes confidence with heart notes of Turkish rose  it’ll greet you at the door with exotic top notes of lychee  but don’t be fooled. For behind this sweet and innocent demeanor  base notes of cedarwood reveal a solid and grounded personality  making for a spicy essence that’s just as feisty as you are!

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-rose-eau-intense-pour-elle
detail: A refreshing  charming scent with a sensual trail.

name: violette-7
detail: Perfumer Fanny Bal still remembers  as clear as day  the moment in her childhood when she became captivated by the violets blossoming in her family’s garden. This composition evokes the scent of recently blossomed petals in nature  as gorgeously discreet as its namesake flower  the epitome of modesty.

name: paula-intense
detail: Paula is clear that life is to be enjoyed. So live each day as if it were the last. In short  intensely! Her positive outlook on life is her hallmark. She exudes joy  femininity  elegance and above all  strength. Paula knows well what she wants and does not let anything get in her way. With Paula Intense  the actress wants to reflect the most powerful and fun sides of her personality. An inspiring scent  intense  cheerful and with character. A scent that stomps. Just like Paula.

name: replica-when-the-rain-stops
detail: Like memories of a spring afternoon  when the sky calms  raindrops roll off the windows  and the smell of wet earth radiates through the air  this fragrance inspires a fresh start and new beginnings.

name: of-a-splash
detail: Lose yourself in the fresh moment of a splash  where skin is liberated and enlaced with droplets of white flowers. A moment of freedom shared only by the touch of summer bodies.

name: linterdit-edition-millesime-burning-neroli-2023
detail: Originally created in 1957 by Hubert de Givenchy  L’Interdit was reinvented as an Eau de Parfum in 2018  as a bold invitation to break free from convention. With the 2023 Millésime edition  the House is showcasing an emblematic ingredient in L’Interdit’s floral bouquet: orange blossom  and more particularly neroli essential oil  which defines the olfactory identity of this enchanting composition. A floral  woody scent full of contrasts  at once fiery and bewitching.

name: irresistible-eau-de-toilette-fraiche-1
detail: The magnetic attraction of the original fragrance is now shared and expressed in a more collective dance than ever before. Irresistible Eau de Toilette Fraiche invites you to shine around its exhilarating imprint. Irresistible is definitely us!

name: n-18-vitamina-citrica-1
detail: This cheerful and energetic scent is a guaranteed shot of fun A yellow jus  just like the sunlight that recharges you every day. Get your dose of sunshine with Vitamina C.ítrica!

name: bloodiris-1
detail: Bloodiris is a tribute to the luxurious orris with an extremely rich and textured composition.

name: peony-sandalwood
detail: 4711 Acqua Colonia Peony & Sandalwood is a sophisticated and graceful creation that feels like a caress of your own skin  harmonising body and mind.

name: linterdit-eau-de-toilette-2022
detail: More subversive than ever  this exhilarating and enchanting eau de toilette continues the story of L’Interdit in 2022. The ravishing opus reveals a deeply addictive sensual thrill.

name: linterdit-eau-de-parfum-rouge-ultime
detail: Rouge Ultime is a radically audacious  no-compromise fragrance  a source of ultimate attraction. Impossible to resist.

name: irresistible-eau-de-parfum-rose-velvet-1
detail: With Rose Velvet  a unique wave of tenderness and sensuality unfolds. The eau de parfum reveals its most enchanting and carnal side. Hearts now beat to the rhythm of an enveloping fragrance that exudes a true skin-to-skin attraction. Tenderness is the new audacity.

name: philtre-ceylan
detail: Day after day  he worked on perfecting the love potion to seduce this untouchable woman. He summoned her early in the morning to the park where the cherry blossoms were blooming. The perfect time to kiss her would be obvious. Later  he realised that she never drank the filter he prepared. Instead  it was fate that brought them together.

name: n-19-eau-de-parfum
detail: Before it was the name of a perfume  Gabrielle was first the name of a woman: Coco Chanel. A woman who made history by changing the rules. A free and passionate woman  who made the choice to be who she wanted to be. Wearing the Gabrielle Chanel perfume is to lay bare your own intensity  to follow your own path and to feel alive and radiant.

name: neon-garden-1
detail: “I wanted to express unconventional classicism through using orris  from iris root  which is so elegant and haute couture. But I wanted to shake it  to heckle it  with the energy of mint ” Fanny Bal  Perfumer.

name: n-20-vitamina-exotica-1
detail: Fun  brave  unpredictable. This is Vitamin E.xótica  a scent as green as a tropical jungle. Get your dose of adventure with this free-spirited fragrance!

name: the-omniscent-mr-thompson
detail: An ephemeral shadow  but as reliable as a grandfather clock. Mr Thompson the Butler is a virtuoso in the art of spying  or discrete observation  as he prefers. Indeed  staying informed is the crux of his job: reading family dramas and disappointments like a shepherd reads the sky. With a sixth sense for indiscretion  he knows something’s awry just before the deed is done. Anticipation beats precipitation every time  is his motto. Only he has the key to a secret box  filled with a unique and eccentric concoction. You might need only a few drops  that will soon turn into a never-ending addiction. An infusion of soft yet sparkling spices opens this captivating fragrance. The addictive trail of a sumptuous powdery orris leads you to a velvety sesame milk while a rich and sweet vanilla bean reveals with subtlety its spellbinding sensuality. Leave the room but don’t you worry  this trail will sign your invisible presence.

name: of-a-bingo-queen
detail: Spray for luck when stakes are high. Time doesn't matter  but underneath you'll always have a four-leaf clover. The thrill of anticipation calls  and your moment answers. Wait! The numbers are spinning. Tumbling pink peppercorns and revolving orange blossom petals. The exhilaration of risk beneath the temptation of reward.

name: lb-a-c-ur-perdu-1
detail: Every time the Comte d'Orsay met L.B.  his heart was turned upside down. A perfume that hides its truth from the indiscreet  opening up to erotic base notes. Every drop is a guilty pleasure  conveniently above suspicion.

name: fearless-fabulous
detail: Looking for a daily dose of positivity? Affirmations and incantations may work for some  but for the Herrera Beauty girl  one spritz of Fearless and Fabulous and it’s in the bag. Embellished with an Eye of the Tiger charm inspired by the Mediterranean evil eye to help you focus on your goals and ward off the haters  this bold scent is all about stepping onto life‘s stage and doing it with attitude and verve. At its heart  a pink gardenia in full bloom  delicate as a vision yet bold and resilient. Like a precious secret waiting to be revealed  it sits wrapped up in warm luxurious layers of cashmere wood  urging you to unleash its quiet power. The reward? A delicious and generous burst of pear elixir top notes that make this plucky fragrance the ultimate pick-me-up.

name: arte-orafa
detail: A sublime scent that will transport you instantly to the foot of the Tuscan hills.

name: night-flow-1
detail: Night Flow is the moment when the dream takes shape. An indulgent summer night  when the slow flow of the hours seduces and leads to the dawn yet to be discovered. Night Flow The chromatic code of the fragrance is inspired by the reflection of the night. The metallic effect conveys the infinite nuances of the night and its sensual and mysterious nature.

name: carioca-heart
detail: Carioca Heart is a tribute to the rhythmic and minimalist melodies of Bossa Nova  an intimate and powerful ode that vibrates in the grace of a new style where the beauty of desire and the romanticism of nostalgia are combined.

name: jimmy-choo-man-aqua-1
detail: Jimmy Choo Man Aqua is as fresh as newly churned sea foam and as revitalising as a morning spent out in the surf.

name: majestic-leather
detail: Spicy  voluminous and infinitely sensual: Majestic Leather takes its wearer on a sensual journey to the Orient.

name: gladiator-oud
detail: Gladiator Oud is a powerful and thrilling scent combining courage and nobility  and inspired by Maximus Decimus Meridius  the legendary gladiator played by Russell Crowe.

name: myrrhe
detail: Myrrhe evokes a rock on the seashore  warmed by the sun. The scent of meditative sophistication.

name: ascendant-intense-1
detail: Created to capture the unique experience of men’s inner determination and physical force with an overdose of spicy and energetic notes that deliver a shot of raw masculine power. It’s time to unleash your intensity.

name: glacier-rock-eau-de-toilette
detail: Rise to the challenge. Exhilarating  invigorating Glacier Rock Eau de Toilette pulses with an energising citrus charge that spreads through you  pushing you to your limits as you head for the finish line.

name: orchid-leather-1
detail: "To create the first leather in the Collection Extraordinaire  I decided to approach this classic note in a different way  exploring the subtle leather accents of plants. I immediately selected rockrose  which contains an exquisite musky  leathery note. Vanilla absolute then revealed itself as an obvious choice  with its spicy and slightly animalic inflections reminiscent of warm leather"  Julien Rasquinet  Perfumer.

name: orris-wakan
detail: An homage to one of the most precious materials in perfumery  Orris. A pure oil blooming like the village of Wakan and its apricot trees in spring.

name: hacivat-x
detail: Hacivat X is a unique interpretation of Nishane's global hit Hacivat  paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance  competence  and love of art.

name: pavilion-1
detail: The inspiration behind Pavilion was Geopark Villa  Andrea Maack's studio headquarters in Iceland. The scent expresses soft facets layered with warming notes that make your heart skip a beat.

name: ambre-safrano
detail: A burning scent that takes us on a heady faraway olfactory journey.

name: orto-delle-spezie-1
detail: Orto Delle Spezie is an intense fragrance inspired by the breathtaking beauty of the Tuscan region.

name: fenix
detail: The most adventurous trip we can take is the one to ourselves to our hearts  where we discover wonders. Fenix is a mystical breeze  which makes the air vibrate with orange and lemon zest  aromatic notes  and spices then plunge us into the mystical world of amber  musk  and wood.

name: incense-rori
detail: The smokiest and darkest rendition of frankincense laying on a bed of woods and moss. Reminiscent of the smell of boats leaving Khor Rori full of frankincense.

name: secret-woods-codename-1
detail: Secret Woods is a portrait of an adventurer. Escaping from ordinary life  he sets out on a journey to find himself. He seeks a new inner balance made of peace and comfort.

name: enclave-1
detail: "When I created Enclave  my idea was to capture the very special light of the sun setting on the fjords of Musandam (Oman). This moment  completely out of time  conveys opposite feelings that I have extrapolated with contrasting ingredients " Julien Rasquinet  Perfumer.

name: suit-of-lights
detail: Suit of Lights is an olfactory interpretation of the unmistakable beauty of the diamond  born of purity  transparency and colours. It's also an homage to another diamond  a star  the King of Pop.

name: vici-leather
detail: Vici Leather is inspired by the victory cry of Julius Caesar. This refined and addictive perfume captures the soft smokiness of a warm leather armchair in a library of leather bound books  a nightcap in a heavy crystal tumbler and a face lit by the soft glow of a fire  surrounded by dancing shadows. The scent of success.

name: seahorse
detail: Balmy sunlight trips across foamy turquoise waves  sending rippling haloes onto the coral below. On the lagoon floor  anemone and seaweed sway in unison  limbs pumping to the rhythm of the current. Hovering among the coral branches  a group of seahorses gazes shyly on. The pulsating beat calls to them and two pair off  their tails entwined in a delicate waltz. Soon their passion is spent  but the memory of the dance lives on. For the pouch of the male seahorse tenderly cradles a precious clutch of eggs.

name: free-dhomme-1
detail: Unconventional and irreverent  Free d'Homme is the essence of a modern free man. A strong desire to run like a wild horse that comes from dreams and enters violently into the wilderness of the mind. It bursts with the desire to escape  to live in the pristine plains of the soul in a relaxed way: at ease.

name: 1472-la-divine-comedie
detail: The scent of fleeing seconds and unquenched desires that morph into a world  accelerating passion. The scent of love teetering on the brink of addiction  of elegance on the brink of vanity  it is also the scent of those terrestrial sparks of joy that  for the span of a second  give a glimpse of what eternity  whether good or evil  feels like.

name: solstice-2023
detail: A refreshing scent inspired by the beautiful Nordic summers.

name: w-long-cha-x
detail: This powerful scent is a perfect choice for those who seek a refreshing and uplifting fragrance that can be worn all year round.

name: santal
detail: Santal is the scent of innocent praise of lightness  pure weightlessness  and the simplicity of existence. Capture the energy of that magical moment where the unknown is no longer frightening as everything becomes effortless  where you feel inevitably magnificent and invincible as if walking on air.

name: supernova
detail: This beautiful fragrance is an olfactory exploration of a visual explosion in space  the optical luminosity of a supernova.

name: lgn-x-aether
detail: This fragrance encapsulates the moment when you discover the first pages of a novel on the terrace of a Parisian café while smoking.

name: linterdit-millesime-nocturnal-jasmine-2022-1
detail: Voluptuous and sensual  L'Interdit Millésime Night Jasmine reveals a jasmine harvested exclusively for Givenchy by night.

name: zero-1
detail: ZERO is a radical expression of simplicity. A reset. The origin of a new perspective: the antithesis of excess. An exploration of freedom found within purposeful parameters. Carbon neutrality embraced as a formative concept; the foundational motif of a fragrance. Every element shaped by reduction. The clarity of restraint.

name: olympea-flora-1
detail: An intense eau de parfum that captures today's glamorous amazon goddess who knows all about the power of flowers. Fabulously fierce. Supremely confident. Gloriously sexy. The pop pink bouquet matches a thorny rose with a fresh-petaled peony  expressing two divine facets of femininity. Dangerous flowers  blooming black and pink in her secret garden. Follow her trail.

name: rojo
detail: Strong  brave and passionate. She has a voice people listen to  and she dares to use it  to share her innermost feelings. She steps boldly into her role as an icon of modern femininity. And incites women around the world to do the same: to own their attributes  and feel their power. Rojo is the color of strength  audacity and passion. An aroma that pays tribute to empowered women everywhere. That speaks to their courage and confidence. That appeals to their most daring side. And shines a strong  radiant light on who they really are. An icon of powerful femininity.

name: loubiprince-1
detail: Loubiprince is symbolized by a mysterious snake enveloping a majestic pyramid. The snake's head is subtly shaped like an iconic Louboutin stiletto.

name: genievre
detail: Genievre evokes a gin on the rocks  shared under a summer sunset.

name: damier-1
detail: Moving  dancing  playing  pursuing on the giant checkerboard at Les Bains Paris. A mythical place. A trail of perfume. Dance floors. Playgrounds. A treasure hunt. Kinetic impressions. Small tiles  large squares  black and white diagonals. Kinetic impressions.

name: une-pistache
detail: Close your eyes and continue your journey to Persian lands  wandering through markets where orange blossoms and pistachios rub shoulders with the scent of marzipan. A smooth  creamy and opulent dessert.

name: scent-of-you-women-1
detail: This sensual fragrance for women celebrates these supposedly chance encounters  these magical surprises and the indescribable first impressions  as if they were written in the stars.

name: clash-chlorophyll-gardenia
detail: Gardenia is a very characteristic note  known as a feminine and intoxicating scent. The perfumer worked to break down this overwhelming scent with the freshness of chlorophyll. An unusual encounter that blossoms into a green floral composition.

name: halloween-man-mystery
detail: The essence of a mysterious  interesting and seductive man.

name: emotions-energy
detail: Emotions Energy! Activate your energy and spread it wherever you go.

name: uefa-champions-league-best-of-the-best
detail: An innovative scent to feel fresh all day long.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Geranium', 'Amber', 'Spearmint', 'Ginger', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Fir Balsam', 'Cosmofruit (Fruity note)', 'Aquaflora (Lily Of The Valley)']

name: dream-3
detail: Ghost Dream is a captivating and enigmatic scent  created for young women who embrace their femininity and independence. Deliciously transparent  light  yet complex  Dream encapsulates the pink clouds of a hazy sunset  the play of light on rippling water. A multi-faceted fragrance  with a subtle depth.

name: dream-dusk
detail: Walk through a garden in full bloom as flurries of spring blossoms scent the air  illuminate the sky  and exhilarate your senses. A dream without end that leads you into the beauty of night.
ingredients: ['Cherry Blossom', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Geranium (China)', 'Honeysuckle', 'Aquaflora (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Bergamot', 'Pink Pepper', 'Benzoin', 'Patchouli', 'Operanide (Woody ambery)']

name: aquavibe-roma
detail: A refreshing scent with a multifaceted personality that will awaken your femininity and well-being.

name: loyal-man-1
detail: It's time to discover a bold  elegant fragrance with staying power. This long-lasting fragrance will become your trusted companion in any situation. Like a faithful co-pilot  you can rely on it to be your constant support  whatever you do!

name: full-speed-supersonic-1
detail: With just one spray this exhilarating fragrance will set the senses soaring with its exclusive Supersonic Boom!

name: david-beckham-beyond-forever
detail: Beyond Forever is dedicated to the modern  elegant man who is not afraid to take on new challenges: in sport  love and life.

name: black-suede-and-fougere-eau-fraiche
detail: Make everyday effortless with Bespoke London’s Black Suede and Fougere Eau Fraiche.

name: black-suede-and-fougere-eau-de-parfum
detail: Make everyday effortless with Bespoke London’s Black Suede and Fougere.

name: rio-que-vibra-1
detail: Rio Que Vibra essence is fresh and lively  perfect for celebrating the colour and movement seen on Leblon beach during a leisurely stroll.

name: dream-banho-de-sorte-1
detail: Dream Banho de Sorte invites you to give free rein to your imagination and make life much more delicious.

name: justice-league-batman
detail: Batman translates the agility and strength of this brave hero.

name: st-james
detail: Our St James cologne offers sweet and sophisticated notes for long-lasting wear.

name: yacht-man-breeze-1
detail: Feel the wind in your hair and the sea spray on your face with this adventurous fragrance for the dynamic and captivating man who is not afraid to grab life with both hands.

name: vip-sheikh
detail: Let the force of nature boost your uniqueness by luring others to you with the scent of VIP Sheikh.

name: amour
detail: For a gentleman who wears his heart on his sleeve and knows self-love is the greatest virtue.

name: colour-me-volt
detail: Add some spark to your style with the help of Colour Me Volt  an electrifying men’s fragrance.

name: old-spice-whitewater
detail: Old Spice Whitewater refreshes the mind and makes every effort a breeze. The scent refined with aquatic notes and a dash of lemon-lime.

name: imperia-rowan-row
detail: The essence to command  with supreme power and strength. It's a statement you are making to your peers. A scent that takes you back to memories of long journeys  both metaphorical and physical. Arduous and challenging  it brings out your inner power and grounds you.

name: russian-leather-1
detail: A modern accord  Memo's Russian Leather is an intriguing fragrance creating a landscape with warmth and depth  captivating all who you come into contact with.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Rosemary', 'Fougère accord', 'Lavandin', 'Mint', 'Clary Sage', 'Basil', 'Cypress', 'Pine Needles', 'Cedar leaf', 'Nutmeg', 'Coriander', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean']

name: fougair
detail: Fougair is as clear as a bright morning and at the same time wraps you in a cocoon of lasting elegance. For urban free spirits.

name: justice-league-superman
detail: Superman translates the agility and strength of this brave superhero.

name: fougere-royale-1884-1
detail: Fougère Royale completely revolutionised the perfumes and established modern perfumery as it exists today. Fougère Royale was the first 'fougère' (or fern-like) perfume ever created  establishing a completely new fragrance family that still remains today.

name: el-2
detail: Night at Acapulco's hottest nightclub. In the heat of the moment  he beckons to the beach  hinting at a midnight swim. He unbuttons his shirt  revealing his tanned skin and the scent of his cologne.

name: musk-oxygen-1
detail: An energetic masculine fragrance with effervescent and elegant notes.

name: absolute-bomb
detail: A vibrant creation for the modern man with an electrifying effect that will make you pause in amazement.

name: corvette-2021
detail: The ultimately fresh  masculine scent encased in vibrant red glass.

name: black-suede-dark-1
detail: Entice with the scent that dares to seduce with an intriguing combination of spicy and sensual notes.

name: luiza-by-luiza-brunet-1
detail: A fragrance created to translate the elegance and claw of Luiza Brunet. Elegance that will be present in you with every gesture and every movement.

name: cest-paris-pour-femme
detail: A love story with Paris. An intuitive and mischievous personality  a fragrance that sets the rules of the game.

name: of-a-rose-garden
detail: Life in bloom. Tumble through the garden of your daydream. A kaleidoscope of transparent roses unfurls in all their vibrant youth. Dancing  they reveal brush strokes of aqueous pink watercolours. Liberated and beautiful  a call to a new generation where we dare to be free and untamed.

name: sweet-black-intense-1
detail: Show off your sensual and feminine side with Sweet Black Intense. A strong  sensual  and very feminine scent. The woman who uses Sweet Black Intense has everything going for her and isn't afraid to live her life to the fullest! She is sure of herself  with a mysterious and captivating smile.

name: divin-part
detail: Why everything rather than nothing? Close your eyes and go back in time. In this inconceivable immensity  all that is not impossible finally happens  and in an unheard-of flash  matter was. A fundamental  luminescent particle  made of azure  vermeil and gold  springs forth. Imagine its beauty  its irresistible power of attraction. The right answer to the wrong questions. Life is not a miracle.

name: leau-de-gina-1
brand: Au Pays de la Fleur d’Oranger
detail: Gina  between modernity and memories. Half seductress  half goddess. A perfume of extreme femininity.

name: aquavibe-jasmin-verbena
detail: A sparkling fragrance with a flirtatious heart and a powerful scent.

name: full-ylang-ylang
detail: Full Ylang Ylang is a unisex  spicy  white floral scent inspired by the rich  blooming and multi-faceted scent of the whole flower.

name: ylang-cananga-1
detail: There is a treasure to be found on the island of Nosy Be in Madagascar: fields of Ylang Ylang as far as the eye can see. Our perfumer Serge de Oliveira remembers the scent particularly well. Its incomparable fragrance inspired him to create this sensuous  smooth  sunny fragrance.

name: jester-1
detail: Joyfully tropical kumquat fruit leads a sparkling symphony of green tangerine  bergamot  and blood orange ~ yieldingwarm berry  ginger  and tamarind  elevated by sophisticated white flowers and sandalwood.

name: apom-femme-extrait-de-parfum
detail: "APOM (A piece of me). A little piece of oneself that one leaves in others. Apom is an inspiration that came to me from the beauty of men and women  from the harmonious colours and flavours of the Middle East that my grandmother told me so many times  and that I rediscovered during my trips to Lebanon. Apom is the strength and softness of citrus blossoms and warm woods". Francis Kurkdjian.

name: narciso-eau-de-parfum-ambree-1
detail: Today  with Narciso Ambrée  Narciso Rodriguez celebrates the brilliant women who have inspired him throughout his life by offering them the warmest and most luminous variation to date.

name: ylang-ylang-nosy-be-1
detail: Ylang Ylang Nosy Be takes you on a journey through the lush fields of Madagascar. The result is a fragrance that reveals endless layers of rich  sensual aromas.

name: encanto-gorgeous
detail: A pleasant  expressive fragrant that will perfectly emphasise your femininity and sensual nature.

name: good-girl-blush
detail: Good Girl Blush is a delicate reinterpretation of Carolina Herrera's iconic fragrance  softer and more playful than ever. With a romantic sensuality  the fragrance expresses the superpower of modern femininity and reveals another facet of the unique character of today's independent woman.

name: joyce-rose
detail: Feel flirty and feminine with this sparkling  addictive eau de toilette that captures the contagious love of life. Seductive and passionate  with playful hints of happiness and winks  it inspires seductive lines. A delight that will make you swoon.

name: love-collides-for-him
detail: A tribute to life on the road. This effervescent fragrance will remind you that on this adventure  anything goes...

name: ultra-sexy-pink-1
detail: Indulge your sweet and sexy side with this exquisitely feminine  deliciously flirty and oh-so-sexy perfume. Ultra Sexy Pink provokes and enchants with deliciously intoxicating notes that will make you feel irresistible and sexier than ever.

name: rocker-femme-fantasy-1
detail: Rocker Femme Fantasy brings out the wild side of Fantasy. Edgier and sexier  the fragrance pushes the notes of Fantasy with a new rebellious Rock 'n' Roll feel.

name: reveal-men-1
detail: He is confident in his ability to conquer a woman's heart. Charismatic with an innate sense of style topped by his handsome looks and somewhat dangerous eyes  women react to him spontaneously. He embraces and excels at the game of seduction.

name: gardenia-jasmin-de-cachemire
detail: When gardenia flirts with jasmine  it is the expression of the seduction of devilishly attractive white flowers.

name: swiss-army-for-her-apricot-rose
detail: Romantic and uplifting  Swiss Army For Her Apricot Rose is a fragrance of sparkling positivity. It is reminiscent of a lakeside on sunny days  the air scented with soft rose petals and delicious fruits. Drench your skin in pure scented joy today.

name: fantasy-the-naughty-remix-1
detail: Daring and mysterious  The Naughty Remix emphasizes fantasy's captivating core notes of jasmine petals  white chocolate orchid  and delicious cupcake. The dry down continues with exotic orris root  sensual woods  and creamy musk  amplified from the original fantasy scent to evoke desire. Leaving you seeking the forbidden  fantasy BRITNEY SPEARS™ The Naughty Remix dares you to unleash the fiery fantasy within.

name: lyra-peach
detail: Lyra Peach pays homage to the Lyra constellation  a small cluster of stars in the Northern sky. Exclusive to Selfridges.

name: mankind-ultimate-1
detail: “The Mankind Ultimate fragrance is designed for the guy with substance  determination  and of course  the ultimate sense of style. This man understands the importance of having balance in his life and looks to achieve that on all levels ” Kenneth Cole.

name: rose-peonia-2
detail: A spring morning  a garden. Meet a young woman in a park dressed in a delicate robe  like flower petals. Imagine her dancing step as a mixture of light peonies and wild roses softened with ambrette and musks  sprinkled with a burst of elegant raspberries.

name: ck-free-sport
detail: “I envisioned a free-spirited man who is never afraid to push his limits. He wears CK Sport to boost his energy by its ineluctable freshness as bursts of citrus and watery florals collide. Deep inside himself  he has a strong motivation and a sense of self that is reflected in my use of bold woods and lingering musk.” - Marie-Pierre Julien  Perfumer

name: figue-blanche-1
detail: Figue Blanche encompasses fresh fig notes mixed with the pulp and essential oils of the Italian mandarin. The warm olfactory tones are complimented with zesty hints of bergamot and neroli.

name: guess-double-dare
detail: "For the creation of Guess Double Dare  I was inspired by the icon and epitome of American glamour and sensuality  Marilyn Monroe. She captured the imagination of the world with her beauty  her style  her playful free spirit and her daring attitude". - Marypierre Julien  Perfumer

name: real-man-1
detail: Real Man represents an evolution of masculinity in today's world with a fragrance that makes a statement. This modern  fougère signature reflects an authentic spirit  and open heart and an inspiring sense of confidence.

name: ocean-di-gioia
detail: Fresh  sparkling  always in motion  Ocean di Gioia is a tribute to the lively  powerful force of nature that is the ocean.

name: rebl-fleur-love-always-1
detail: "I think a woman should dare to be different  ready to live life for herself and not for others. This fragrance is my passion for individuality  expressive and powerful  but also emotional and fascinating. I promise you that Reb'l Fleur Love Always will not be easy to forget " Rhianna.

name: jessica-simpson-signature-1
detail: Like Jessica Simpson herself  her Signature fragrance is sparkling and charming  while boasting an air of sophistication.

name: santalum
detail: To compose her velvety  rich scent  Marypierre Julien was inspired by a sandalwood fan that her grandmother brought back from a trip to Australia. She recalls how this precious item would perfume a room with each wave of the hand. Full of woody notes and milky accents  this original fragrance has turned sandalwood into an emblem of sensuality  capturing all of its sweetness  smoothness and timeless elegance.

name: ithaque
detail: Set off for Ithaca  that mythical island in the Ionian Sea  home to the epic tale of Ulysses and Penelope. An island of encounters at the heart of the archipelago  where the strength of cedar  vivacity of bergamot and sweetness of blackcurrant come together as one.

name: homme-exclusive-1
detail: A captivating and luxurious fragrance that exudes power and confidence.

name: incandessence-soleil-1
detail: I breathe in sunny days to feel the lightness  freedom and sparkle of summer. My soul is awakened  I was made for summer days.

name: cherry-smoke-1
detail: "Cherry Smoke captures the darker side of the cherry experience  hedonistic and fiery"  Tom Ford.

name: absolue-dosmanthe-extrait-1
detail: A sensual fragrance  sophisticated and daring  harmoniously constructed around the flower of osmanthus  with soft fruity accents.

name: mad-world
detail:
In this Mad World  it’s ok not to be ok. Enter this zen-like grounding fragrance that feels like a little moment of calm amidst the madness. The setting? A peaceful inner oasis far from the chaos and demands of modern life  filled  with the scent of osmanthus flowers. Take a step forward into a citrus green aura that wraps around you like a protective shroud. As you keep going  top notes of bergamot gently peel away to reveal a smoky ethereal lapsang souchong heart. 
Sweet yet sour  its plucky pineapple charm reminds us that life too can be bittersweet and full of contrasts. But remember  for every tear shed  there’s a ray of sunshine waiting around the corner!

name: absolue-dosmanthe-1
detail: This fragrance is a modern take on the centuries-old scent of osmanthus. The sweet scent of the osmanthus tree creates a lively and impactful fragrance that is truly innovative.

name: gris-charnel-extrait-1
detail: Gris Charnel Extrait is the apotheosis of Parisian sensuality.

name: yourmoment-women-eau-de-parfum-2020
detail: Enjoy the moment! No matter whether privately or professionally  whether you have won a big competition or have a little moment of happiness in everyday life. This is your moment!

name: myrrh-tonka-cologne-intense-2023
detail: The golden sand dunes of the Namib: home of distinctive myrrh trees. The alluring scent of its resin travelling on the hot air  mingling with the warm almond and lush vanilla notes of the tonka bean. Noble and intoxicating. A special edition to celebrate Ramadan.

name: narciso-rodriguez-for-him-vetiver-musc
detail: Vetiver Musc embodies a new masculinity  taking inspiration from vibrant minerals and rich evergreen forests  with deep fragrant wood.

name: azul-indigo-ltd-ed-2020-1
detail: Indigo Blue takes us into its aromatic universe through citrus notes that reinforce the freshness of the fragrance. The sensual base notes prolong the seduction on the skin.

name: frustration
detail: A mixture like a miscellanea that clashes between words and materials to explain just a little  without explaining too much  the why of a perfume. Frustration.

name: gris-charnel-1
detail: Infinite shades of grey; As time passes  the beauty of the grey colour is revealed on the skin and in the streets of Paris. An urban elixir of carnal grey like a seductive potion. A stroll under the silvery moon along the quays  alone or accompanied facing the Seine.

name: red-hibiscus-2021-1
detail: A chance encounter with a rare and vivid flower in a tropical forest.

name: waterlily
detail: The pristine waters of a tranquil pond  the jewel in the crown of the Huwon Secret Garden in Seoul. Majestic white water lilies adorn the surface  shimmering in the morning light and emanating a clean florality that touches and enchants.

name: rose-magnolia-2024
detail: A sensual floral with a mysterious character. Some may even describe it as magic. Luminous magnolia and a duet of roses  blooming and enchanting.

name: beyond-exotic-musk-1
detail: A silky haze of musk evokes the sensuality of Acapulco nights.

name: suave-skin-1
detail: An explosive and feminine scent.

name: alpha-woods-1
detail: Aromatic and fresh notes  enriched with spicy touches  open this composition with a strong woody personality. The rich floral bouquet is enhanced by powdery nuances  which give the blend a timeless elegance. The accord finds its harmony in the multifaceted smoky shades and sophisticated touches in the base.

name: oh-the-origin-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: I still remember that party when we met. I remember you blushing  your smile  your aura of mystery. Now we are here. The blue sky melts into the infinite ocean. While the silver waves break against your toes  I can see the origin of our story in your eyes. I draw you closer... I notice a different freshness on your skin  floral  slightly musky notes. Will this be the aroma that forever reminds me of our first trip together?

name: rosa-centifolia
detail: Rosa Centifolia is deeply rooted in its history as the most legendary creation of the Berlin based perfume house. Its reinvention surprises with a completely new perception of a rose and takes the rose theme into a whole new world without gender boundaries. This Rosa Centifolia blossoms coolly above the warmth of woods and spices and it comes with a message: expect the unexpected!

name: this-is-us-1
detail: THIS IS US! glides over bare skin like a cashmere jumper  the iconic piece of Zadig&Voltaire's wardrobe.

name: rose-magnolia-2022
detail: A sensual floral with a mysterious character. Some may even describe it as magic.

name: yuja
detail: The eye-catching yuja (South Korean yuzu)  ripening in the groves of South Korea  infuses the air with its mouth-watering effervescence. Originally from Asia  this tantalising citrus is an unexpected addition to our palate.

name: green-almond-redcurrant-2023
detail: This summery cologne contains bright fruity notes along with sensual musks  wrapped in roasted oak for a slightly citrusy  slightly woodsy scent that works well for both women and men.

name: police-to-be-sweet-girl
detail: Assertive and eccentric  she has a strong personality  doing what she loves without giving up life's pleasures!

name: scarlet-poppy-cologne-intense
detail: From the poppies of England's golden fields to the wild steppes of Asia  this dazzling fragrance is inspired by extravagant exotic flowers. An opulent and delicious fragrance.

name: this-is-us-leau-for-all
detail: No gender  no age  no borders. An unusual business. As glamorous and rocking as ever  of course  but buzzing with a wild hope: to quench the Zadig tribe's infinite thirst for liberté  more and more  but never quite. In other words  vitality  joie de vivre  and not just a soupçon: L'Eau for All is an electroshock  an irresistible wave of freshness.

name: waterlily-2023
detail: Radiant waterlilies  the crown jewel of a crystal-clear pond in a secret garden. These white petals release a clean floralcy that stirs and enchants. Representing enlightenment  the floating bloom has a dewy freshness that is enhanced with a flourish of white flowers.

name: rose-magnolia
detail: A sensual floral with a mysterious character. Some might even describe it as magical. Luminous magnolia and a duo of roses  blooming and enchanting.

name: this-is-me
detail: A carefree spirit  the affirmation of a relaxed lifestyle: the desire to be happy  to be happy together. At Zadig & Voltaire  children too are rock 'n' roll.

name: pamplemousse-rhubarbe
detail: Get ready to indulge your senses with Pamplemousse Rhubarbe! This fragrance is the stunning result of a chance meeting between two vibrant and zesty ingredients. With its timeless appeal and unisex fragrance  this citrusy scent is both elegant and energising.

name: yellow-hibiscus-2021-1
detail: The resplendent yellow hibiscus is revered: its fan-shaped petals are delicate to the touch and unfurl each evening to welcome the sun. The dewy freshness of rose underpins this sparkling floral fragrance  with a slice of citrus adding a touch of juiciness.

name: divine-passion
detail: A juicy and gourmand scent.

name: green-almond-redcurrant-2017-1
detail: This summery cologne contains bright fruity notes along with sensual musks  wrapped in roasted oak for a slightly citrusy  slightly woodsy scent that works well for both women and men.

name: vetiver-golden-vanilla-cologne-intense
detail: This deliciously sensual fragrance opens with a hint of spice and citrus that gives way to the earthy depths of vetiver native to Madagascar. Precious vanilla  hand-picked from the orchid-filled jungle  warms and envelops.

name: moonlit-camomile-1
detail: An evening wander filled with possibility. The enchanting freshness of English camomile feathery leaves mingle with bright  white flowers  glimpsed in the garden after dark. A calming scent.

name: iris-rebelle-1
detail: He was drawing obsessively  invading her space as if he were alone. But when she changed her seat he could not stop staring at her. Days later backstage  she was nervously breathing as the crowd was waiting for the ballet to start. At that moment  she unexpectedly saw him in the front row. All at once  she felt strong and calm  as if they were alone.

name: iris
detail: It was in Morocco  amidst the Atlas Mountains  that our perfumer Steve Guo discovered the beauty and complexity of the scent of Iris. Its memorable scent left such an impression on him that he wished to interpret it with an incomparable perfume.

name: figuier-eden-1
detail: “I wanted to know what it may be like to be in the midst of the garden known as paradise. I believe only a fragrance could capture this in the imagination.” Giorgio Armani.

name: burberry-her-elixir-de-parfum
detail: A bold and sensual fragrance for free-spirited women seeking the excitement of their next adventure.

name: porsche-design-woman-ruby
detail: She is strong and independent. She enjoys life in all its facets  is open and sensitive  sometimes cheeky  but always with a wink. Such is the woman whose personality finds expression in Porsche Design Woman Ruby. A strong  emotional fragrance. Modern and yet timeless. Cool and sensual at the same time.

name: porsche-design-pure-22-1
detail: "I wanted to create a fragrance that tells a story of self-expression and sophistication  and captures the blue hour of the day. The moment when everything seems to calm down after a long day at work " Maïa Lernout  Perfumer.

name: liu-jo-milano
detail: An Oriental perfume with multi-faceted notes  sparkled by juicy citrus as a tribute to the confident and explosive femininity of Liu•Jo women. The heart is electrified by joyful and festive notes. Sensuality is celebrated with the addition of gourmand notes that envelope this sophisticated perfume.

name: flora-luminare-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The poetic promise of an endless Day. Warm sunlight dancing with shadows of palm fronds on white coral sand. Welcoming armfuls of alabaster tiaré blooms. Illumine your inner nature with an inflorescent paradise.

name: eau-corsee-1
detail: Do you like surprising combinations of flavours? Then try this electrifying fragrance! On the skin  feel the thrill of a crisp  toasty aroma  twisted with a powdery scent - dare to go for intensity! Wearing Eau Corsée  you will attract attention and assert your character loud and clear with this affordable floral "chute".

name: milk-musk-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The quiet morning light enters softly through the sash glass. Freshly ironed sheets wrap skin over skin  snuggled in the comforting embrace of milky notes. A comforting warm cashmere whispers soothingly silvery white musk as a melody of piano chords tinkles on the record player. Pure connection to deep love in a private haven.

name: ginza-murasaki-1
detail: Murasaki is a popular purple shade in Japan  a symbol of refinement  power and elegance. A noble colour formerly reserved for the court and samurai. Ginza Murasaki represents modern femininity with enough power to shine in our modern world.

name: flora-luminare-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Sheer turquoise lagoons gleam translucent with slivers of morning light. Coral gardens illuminated with incandescent clarity. Bountiful heads of pure white tiare and jasmine mingle with precious  golden ylang-ylang  trade winds waft their heady aroma to Pointe Vénus. Escape to an otherworldly atoll idyll.

name: cool-water-wave-woman-2018
detail: Catch the waves! The ocean is her playground. Feeling the positive energy from the elements  she plays  she competes and goes beyond the limits. One philosophy: good vibes. From the wave of adrenaline  to the thrill of seduction. Seduction as a game.

name: costa-azzurra-parfum-2
detail: Costa Azzurra Parfum conjures the remote  deserted beaches and wild landscapes that dot the panoramic Mediterranean coastline  elevating the mood from uninhibited to unbridled  entering an enhanced dimension of total  perfect escape.
ingredients: ['Myrtle', 'Artemisia', 'Basil', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Lavandin', 'Oak', 'Cypress', 'Celery Seeds', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Seaweed / Algae', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Ambergris', 'Cardamom', 'Driftwood', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lentisk', 'Patchouli', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)', 'Ambrofix (Ambergris)', 'Cedarwood (Lebanon)', 'Salty Amber']

name: soleil-infidele-1
detail: The essence of a journey inside a bottle  with the same turquoise colours as a beach on the other side of the world. A fragrance as sweet as desire itself.

name: beach-vibes-2023
detail: This fragrance was inspired by the sound  sight and scents of serene ocean waves washing over soft white sands. Step into paradise with this refreshing and heavenly scent.
ingredients: ['Pear Blossom', 'Marine', 'Salty Amber', 'Bellini', 'Orange Blossom', 'Water Lily', 'Mandarin', 'Cedarwood', 'Sea Water', 'Sandalwood (New Caledonia)']

name: at-the-beach-1
detail: Life's more beautiful at the beach! Especially with our At The Beach Body Mist - a scent that will make you feel like you're at the beach  even when you can't get there!

name: cuba-vip-for-men
detail: Cuba VIP for Men is a seductive fragrance brimming with masculine power.

name: studio-1886-legendary-1
detail: Inspired by Avon’s 134-year heritage  the Studio 1886 Collection offers the latest bold and unforgettable fragrance experience with Studio 1886 Legendary. The perfect balance of confidence and discovery.

name: lempicka-green-lover
detail: Green Lover expresses the elegance and refined masculinity of today's man.

name: joop-homme-ice-1
detail: Ice melting on naked skin. Drops of chilled water falling onto a muscular  wet body. Shivers as the cool breath flows over a bare neck. Dive in! You are now entering the audacious world of the Joop! fantasy. Joop! Homme Ice - cold is the new hot!

name: cedar-1
detail: This fragrance exudes an understated sensuality and elegance.

name: fantasia-1
detail: She is a contradiction with a mind of her own! All sugar and spice and everything nice! Just fun and happiness  with an effusive zest for life. Fantasia fills her world with colors; a little sweet  a little spicy  a little sexy too! Pop glamour with a touch of Alice in Wonderland. Give life a kiss!

name: burberry-hero-eau-de-parfum
detail: "My inspiration for this fragrance was my memory of the Landes forest  where pine trees grow close to the ocean. The scent of the pine needles melted with a trail of warm sand and sea spray was the aroma I wanted to recreate. For me  the sensual and crystalised resins included in the fragrance represent the power of reconnecting with your natural instinct " Aurélien Guichard  Perfumer.

name: souvenirs-de-tunisie-1
detail: A white flower tempered by fresh notes  this orange blossom absolute is drenched in water  blended with fresh bergamot and enticing neroli. The magnificent blend of sandalwood and orange wood in the dry down is lightly sweetened by fresh almonds  like in the pastries made on the other side of the Mediterranean Sea.

name: love-rush-paris-hilton
detail: "This is my most intimate fragrance to date  the perfume I wore on my wedding day. Since I was a little girl  I dreamt of my wedding day and this fragrance made it even more special and memorable. Whenever I wear Love Rush  I feel immersed in true love and happiness " Paris Hilton.

name: narcisse-blanc-1
detail: This Narciss Blanc is an equivocal and captivating signature fragrance that is endlessly fascinating.

name: bo-bo
detail: Bo-BoThe folk dance is just what it sounds like: a living  festive custom that still conveys the Mediterranean festive spirit today".

name: wind-flowers-1
detail: Wind Flowers is a journey of dance. A story that unveils graceful movements alongside reflective thoughts that rush through the body as the sensation of strength  empowerment and freedom overwhelms the senses.

name: giorgio
detail: Timeless and classic  this signature is quite simply described as ‘the essence of Beverly Hills in a bottle' Glamorous and eternal  Giorgio Beverly Hills is the very embodiment of glamorous Californian style.

name: tarifa
detail: A journey along the Mediterranean ridge that provides an inexhaustible source of inspiration and olfactory expressions.
